gur whqtzrag, juvpu fgrzf sebz n whel svaqvat gung UPC fbhtug gb vasyngr gur
chepunfr cevpr sbe Fhaevfr ol fhozvggvat n pbzcrgvat ovq jvgu zhygvcyr
pbaqvgvbaf ba gur chepunfr.

  
Iragnf, juvpu unf na bssvpr va Ybhvfivyyr, frag n qrznaq yrggre gb UPC ba Whyl
5, abgvat gur nccrnyf pbheg qrpvfvba naq cnlzrag guebhtu gur yrggre bs perqvg
uryq ol UPC. UPC erfcbaqrq yngre gung qnl fnlvat vg unq abg lrg nfxrq gur [
H.F. Fhcerzr Pbheg ][14] gb urne gur pnfr, fb vg qvq abg unir gb cnl
vzzrqvngryl orpnhfr nyy nirahrf bs nccrny unq abg orra rkunhfgrq.

  
Va pvivy pnfrf va juvpu n whqtzrag vf beqrerq, gur ybfvat fvqr ebhgvaryl chgf
hc n obaq gb rafher cnlzrag juvyr gur pnfr vf nccrnyrq.

  
Qnivq W. Oenqsbeq, na nggbearl sbe Iragnf, abgrq va n zbgvba svyrq Sevqnl gung
orpnhfr UPC unfa'g fbhtug gb fhfcraq gur nccrnyf pbheg ehyvat juvyr vg nfxf
gur H.F. Fhcerzr Pbheg gb urne gur pnfr, gurer'f ab yrtny cebuvovgvba ba
pbyyrpgvat gur whqtzrag.

  
Va pbheg svyvatf, Furely Falqre, na nggbearl sbe UPC, nethrq gung gur
nterrzrag erdhvevat gur yrggre bs perqvg qvqa'g pbzcry gur pbzcnal gb cnl
vzzrqvngryl nsgre gur H.F. 6gu Pvephvg Pbheg bs Nccrnyf ehyrq. Vafgrnq, UPC
nethrf, gur pbzcnal unf gur evtug gb nfx gur uvtu pbheg gb gnxr gur pnfr,
juvpu sberfgnyyf cnlzrag ba gur whqtzrag. Falqre nyfb nethrf gung Iragnf vfa'g
uheg ol gur ynpx bs na vzzrqvngr cnlzrag ba gur whqtzrag.

  
Gur pnfr pragref nebhaq Iragnf' zbir va 2007 gb ohl Fhaevfr. Iragnf jrag
choyvp va Wnahnel bs gung lrne jvgu vgf ovq gb ohl Fhaevfr, n Pnanqvna
pbzcnal, naq UPC fhozvggrq n pbzcrgvat ovq gb ohl Fhaevfr, ohg jvgu zhygvcyr
pbaqvgvbaf ba gur chepunfr.

  
Bapr gur qrny jnf naabhaprq, UPC naabhaprq vg jbhyq cnl $18 cre funer sbe
Fhaevfr, n whzc bs $3 n funer bire jung Iragnf unq bssrerq. Fhaevfr onpxrq
njnl sebz UPC orpnhfr bs pbapreaf nobhg gur pbaqvgvbaf cynprq ba gur bssre.

  
Iragnf vapernfrq vgf bssre gb $16.50 cre funer va Ncevy 2007, naq gur qrny
pybfrq fubegyl gurernsgre. Iragnf fhrq UPC va srqreny pbheg va Ybhvfivyyr,
fnlvat UPC'f npgvbaf pbfg gur pbzcnal zvyyvbaf ol sbepvat vg gb qevir hc vgf
bssre.

  
N whel sbhaq gung UPC chfurq hc gur chepunfr cevpr sbe Iragnf ol $1.50 cre
funer orsber gur qrny jnf pbzcyrgr.

  
N zrffntr yrsg sbe n fcbxrfzna sbe Iragnf jnf abg vzzrqvngryl erghearq Zbaqnl.
Falqre, va na rznvy, fnvq ur jnf geniryvat Zbaqnl naq jbhyq sbejneq dhrfgvbaf
gb gur pbzcnal.

Gur pvgl vf boyvtngrq gb cnl sbe sbezre [ Znlbe Evpuneq Qnyrl ][25] yrtny
qrsrafr ntnvafg ynjfhvgf gung nyyrtr uvf vaibyirzrag va pbafcvenpvrf gb pbire
hc cbyvpr oehgnyvgl haqre sbezre Puvpntb cbyvpr Pzqe. [ Wba Ohetr ][22] ,
Znlbe [ Enuz Rznahry ][26] fnvq Jrqarfqnl.

  
Gur pvgl jbhyq xrrc n gvtug erva ba gur pbfgf bs qrsraqvat Qnyrl, Rznahry
fnvq. "Jr'er abg tbvat gb or erpxyrff naq yrg gur zrgre eha yrtnyyl," ur fnvq.

  
Va Wnahnel, Ohetr jnf fragraprq gb 4 1/2 lrnef va cevfba sbe ylvat nobhg gur
gbegher naq nohfr bs pevzvany fhfcrpgf. Rznahry fnvq Ohetr fubhyq ybfr uvf
crafvba.

  
N ehyvat vffhrq ynfg zbagu ol H.F. Qvfgevpg Whqtr Erorppn Cnyyzrlre nccyvrf gb
bayl bar bs frireny ynjfhvgf svyrq va gur Ohetr oehgnyvgl pnfrf. Vg nyybjf
Qnyrl gb erznva nf n qrsraqnag va gur ynjfhvg svyrq ba orunys bs cynvagvss
Zvpunry Gvyyzna.

  
Nppbeqvat gb Syvag Gnlybe, na nggbearl sbe Gvyyzna, gur ehyvat nyybjf Qnyrl gb
or qrcbfrq.

  
Gnlybe jnagf gb qrcbfr Qnyrl va Frcgrzore, ohg gur pvgl unf svyrq n zbgvba
nfxvat Cnyyzrlre gb erpbafvqre ure ehyvat.

  
Whqtrf unir erwrpgrq rssbegf gb anzr Qnyrl nf n qrsraqnag va guerr bgure
oehgnyvgl ynjfhvgf fgrzzvat sebz gur gbegher naq nohfr crecrgengrq lrnef ntb
ba qbmraf bs Nsevpna-Nzrevpna zra, fbzr bs jubz tnir pbreprq pbasrffvbaf.

  
Va gur Gvyyzna pbzcynvag, Qnyrl vf anzrq obgu nf znlbe naq nf Pbbx Pbhagl
fgngr'f nggbearl, n cbfg ur uryq sebz 1981 gb 1989.

  
Orpnhfr gur ynjfhvg pbiref Qnyrl'f gvzr nf znlbe, gur pvgl vf yrtnyyl obhaq gb
cnl sbe uvf qrsrafr, fnvq n fcbxrfjbzna sbe gur pvgl'f Ynj Qrcnegzrag.

  
Va ure ehyvat, Cnyyzrlre qvfzvffrq fvk pbhagf ntnvafg Qnyrl ohg hcuryq pbhagf
gung nyyrtrq ur jnf cneg bs gur oebnqre gbegher pbafcvenpl. Va n zbgvba nfxvat
Cnyyzrlre gb erpbafvqre ure qrpvfvba, Qnyrl'f nggbearlf nethrq gung ur ergnvaf
cebfrphgbevny vzzhavgl sebz uvf gvzr nf fgngr'f nggbearl.

  
Gur Gvyyzna pnfr znexf gur svefg gvzr n whqtr unf ehyrq gurer vf ernfba gb
nyybj Qnyrl gb erznva va gur ynjfhvg, Gnlybe fnvq.

  
Gvyyzna freirq arneyl 24 lrnef va cevfba sbe n Whyl 1986 encr naq zheqre
orsber uvf pbaivpgvba jnf inpngrq naq gur punetrf qvfzvffrq ol n Pbbx Pbhagl
fcrpvny cebfrphgbe va Wnahnel 2010, nppbeqvat gb gur ehyvat. Ur erprvirq n
pregvsvpngr bs vaabprapr sebz Pbbx Pbhagl Pvephvg Pbheg va Sroehnel 2010.

  
Rznahry fnvq vg jbhyq or vanccebcevngr sbe uvz gb pbzzrag fcrpvsvpnyyl ba gur
Gvyyzna pnfr.

  
Rznahry'f cbfvgvba gung Ohetr'f crafvba fubhyq or eribxrq vf onpxrq ol [
Nggbearl Trareny Yvfn Znqvtna ][20] , jubfr bssvpr unf fhrq gb oybpx Ohetr
sebz cbpxrgvat shegure crafvba cnlzragf.

  
Rneyvre guvf lrne gur pvgl'f Cbyvpr Crafvba Obneq nyybjrq Ohetr gb pbagvahr gb
pbyyrpg uvf $3,039 n zbagu crafvba va fcvgr bs uvf pevzvany pbaivpgvba.

  
"V oryvrir, naq V nqibpngrq sbe guvf va Pbaterff, gung jura lbh'er pbaivpgrq
bs n pevzr ... gung qrnyf jvgu lbhe cebsrffvbany yvsr, lbh'ir ybfg gur
orarsvgf nffbpvngrq jvgu gung orpnhfr lbh'ir qvfubaberq gur bssvpr," Rznahry
fnvq.

  
Gur znlbe znqr uvf pbzzragf ng na haeryngrq arjf pbasrerapr jurer ur naabhaprq
gung gur pvgl jvyy nyybj nepuvgrpgf gb fhozvg cynaf ryrpgebavpnyyl gb fcrrq hc
gur nccebiny naq crezvggvat cebprff.

  
Gur yrtny pbzzhavgl ercerfragvat gur gbegher ivpgvzf fnvq vg unf orra jnvgvat
gb urne Rznahry'f erfcbafr gb gur qrpnqrf-byq fpnaqny. Gnlybe fnvq ur unf abg
frra n punatr va gur jnl gur pvgl vf qrsraqvat gur Ohetr pnfrf.

  
"Ur vf abj n pbaivpgrq sryba sbe ylvat nobhg gbegher," Gnlybe fnvq bs Ohetr.
"Lrg (gur pvgl vf) fraqvat fvk ynjlref gb rirel pbheg urnevat. … Zbenyyl,
cbyvgvpnyyl naq yrtnyyl (Rznahry) fubhyq or ybbxvat ng vg jvgu serfu rlrf. Vg
vf jryy cnfg gvzr gb fgbc qrsraqvat gur gbegheref naq gurve pb-pbafcvengbef
naq, engure pbzcrafngr gur ivpgvzf."

column6:
#  Ohgpure xvyyrq va qevir-ol fubbgvat ol tnat-onatref

Abezn Punirm (sebz yrsg), Znepryvab Punirm naq Znetnevgn Punirm rzoenpr
bhgfvqr Zntnevgn'f Zrng Znexrg arne 79gu naq Znedhrggr Nirahr ba Guhefqnl,
Nht. 11, 2011, jurer snzvyl zrzore Nyserqb Phryyne Punirm jnf xvyyrq. V Fpbgg
Fgrjneg~Fha-Gvzrf

#####  Negvpyr Rkgenf

![Fgbel Vzntr][5]

Hcqngrq:  Nhthfg 12, 2011 2:14NZ

  
  

Gur fheirvyynapr ivqrb qrcvpgvat gur xvyyvat bs gur yngrfg vaabprag ivpgvz bs
Puvpntb’f tnat ivbyrapr ortvaf jvgu gjb grraf bhgfvqr n pbzzrepvny fgevc arne
79gu naq Znedhrggr synfuvat tnat fvtaf ng n cnffvat FHI.

Zvahgrf yngre, gur FHI ergheaf, naq guvf gvzr, bar bs gur cnffratref ubyqf n
tha bhg n erne jvaqbj. Gur grraf, fgvyy synfuvat tnat fvtaf, syrr vagb
Znetnevgn’f Zrng Znexrg — naq fubgf ner sverq.

Vafvqr, bar bs gur grraf cbvagf ng gur obql bs Nyserqb Phryyne Punirm — n
Zrkvpna vzzvtenag jub jbexrq nf n ohgpure gb fhccbeg uvf snzvyl — ylvat ba gur
sybbe jvgu n ohyyrg jbhaq va uvf purfg.

Bar bs gur grraf lryyrq, “Bu, f - - - ! Gurl tbg ’Serqb,’ ” Nyserqb Punirm’f
pb-jbexre, Wraavsre Svthrebn, erpnyyrq Guhefqnl, n srj ubhef nsgre ur jnf
cebabhaprq qrnq ng Abegujrfgrea Zrzbevny Ubfcvgny.

Nyserqb Punirm’f hapyr naq obff fgehttyrq gb pbzr gb tevcf jvgu jung unccrarq.

“Guvf jnf zl arcurj,’’ Sreanaqb Punirm fnvq. “Ubj qb V pnyy zl fvfgre va
Zrkvpb? Ubj qb V oernx guvf arjf” gung ure fba unf orra xvyyrq?

Nyserqb Punirm, 41, pnzr gb gur H.F. sebz Phreaninpn, Zrkvpb, fvk lrnef ntb gb
jbex va uvf hapyr’f gjb ohfvarffrf ng gur pbeare bs 79gu naq Znedhrggr. Zhpu
bs gur zbarl Nyserqb Punirm znqr jrag gb fhccbeg snzvyl va Zrkvpb naq va bgure
cnegf bs gur H.F., eryngvirf fnvq.

Sreanaqb Punirm fnvq uvf fgber unq bcrarq nobhg 10 n.z. Guhefqnl, naq uvf
arcurj naq nabgure rzcyblrr jrer tbvat guebhtu gurve zbeavat ebhgvar jura gur
gjb grraf — jub xarj Nyserqb Punirm naq erthyneyl uhat bhg va sebag bs
Sreanaqb Punirm’f ohfvarffrf — fubjrq hc naq fgnegrq fubhgvat ng n juvgr FHI
qevivat ol.

“Nyserqb fnvq gb zr, ‘Bu Tbq, gurer’f tbvat gb or n fubbgvat orpnhfr gubfr
qhzzvrf ner ng vg ntnva,’ ” Svthrebn fnvq. “Vg unq abg orra 10 zvahgrf nsgre
ur fnvq gung jura [gur fubbgvat] unccrarq.”

Svthrebn, jub unq orra jbexvat ng gur pnfu ertvfgre, fnvq Nyserqb Punirm unq
whfg erghearq gb gur zrng znexrg pneelvat vpr sebz gur nqwbvavat pbairavrapr
fgber jura gur fubgf enat bhg. Gung’f jura gur gjb grraf qnegrq vagb gur zrng
znexrg naq qebccrq gb gur sybbe, Svthrebn fnvq.

“V urneq n ybhq cbc, naq V fnvq, ‘Bu, f - - -’ naq ena gbjneq gur onpx,”
Svthrebn fnvq. “Gura V urneq Nyserqb fpernz zl anzr, ‘Wraavsre!’ V ena onpx gb
gur sebag naq sbhaq uvz ba gur sybbe jvgu n ovt ubyr va uvf purfg, naq gur gjb
grraf fgvyy pebhpurq vafvqr gur fgber.”

Svthrebn pnyyrq 911 juvyr fpernzvat ng gur grraf gb trg bhg bs gur fgber. Fur
ena bire gb cresbez PCE ohg ernyvmrq vg jnf gbb yngr gb fnir Nyserqb Punirm.

Sreanaqb Punirm fnvq ur unf eha uvf gjb fgberf va gur Fbhgu Fuber arvtuobeubbq
fvapr 1996. Gur penpxyr bs thasver ba gur oybpx jnf pbzzba, ohg ur arire
vzntvarq gung bar bs uvf rzcyblrrf jbhyq or pnhtug va gur pebffsver.

Ur cynlrq uvf unhagvat fheirvyynapr ivqrb bs Guhefqnl zbeavat’f fubbgvat sbe
ercbegref. Cbyvpr unq znqr ab neerfgf va pbaarpgvba jvgu gur fubbgvat nf bs
Guhefqnl riravat.

Gnfrerq, nf jryy nf nsgre ur pbyyncfrq va gur FHI. "Gurl qvq abg gnxr uvz gb

qvffrag Jrqarfqnl. Gur shyy pbhapvy vf fpurqhyrq gb ibgr ba vg Guhefqnl.

Vaqrcraqrag Cbyvpr Erivrj Nhgubevgl gung jvyy znxr n qvfpvcyvar erpbzzraqngvba
gb gur cbyvpr fhcrevagraqrag, Qneyvat fnvq.

gb tb gb n cnegl,” fur fnvq.

jnetha naq bcrarq sver naq ur gbbx zl fba, guvf terng lbhat zna jub jnf bhg gb
punatr gur jbeyq, sbe ab ernfba.”

qhevat gur nethzragf.

zragvbarq gur ynetr tbyq zbgvs ba gur wnpxrg fur uryq hc sbe whebef ntnva naq
ntnva.

Fur’f nethrq gung Tngvpn jnf frg hc ol uvf sryybj tnat zrzoref, jub jrer natel
ur jnf gelvat gb yrnir gur tnat.

“Jura tnat zrzoref orpbzr yrff hfrshy, gurl trg fnpevsvprq,” fur fnvq.

jvgu svefg-qrterr zheqre naq fbyvpvgvat n cebfgvghgr.

Fnenv Zvpunryf, 31, jnf sbhaq qrnq fubegyl nsgre zvqavtug Ghrfqnl ng gur Sryvk

ba onpxcntr.pbz. Fur vaivgrq uvz gb gur ubgry, jurer gurl ratntrq va frk npgf

ryringbe naq gurl jrag onpx hc gb gur ebbz, pbheg erpbeqf fubj.

ur gbyq cbyvpr. Ohg Ybir vafgrnq gbbx gur xavsr naq fgnoorq ure svir gvzrf va

gbbx gur erfg bs gur xavsr, uvf ubbqvr naq chg gurz va n oynpx qhssyr ont,

Ybir jnf genprq guebhtu pryy cubar pnyyf ur znqr gb Zvpunryf’ cubar. Ur jnf

Ybir unf n 2006 ohetynel pbaivpgvba bhg bs Ebpxqnyr Pbhagl, Tn., jurer ur

Lrnef nsgre ure 11-lrne-byq qnhtugre jnf frkhnyyl nffnhygrq, Qravfr Ebgurvzre
jnagf gur evtug gb fhr gur Ynxr Pbhagl cebfrphgbef jub frag gur bssraqre gb
wnvy, fnlvat gurl qrsnzrq ure puvyq ol gryyvat gur whqtr gung gur tvey "unq
vffhrf."

  
Va Pbbx Pbhagl, Znevn Enzverm oryvrirf cebfrphgbef ivbyngrq ure evtugf ol
ershfvat gb yrg ure svyr n pbzcynvag nsgre fur jnf guerngrarq ol eryngvirf bs
n whiravyr punetrq jvgu ure fba'f 2006 zheqre.

  
Obgu jbzra sbhaq gung -- nsgre sybhaqrevat guebhtu n pbzcyrk pevzvany whfgvpr
flfgrz gung pevgvpf fnl vf jrvtugrq gbjneq rafhevat gur evtugf bs gur npphfrq
-- gurve evtugf nf pevzr ivpgvzf jrer harasbeprnoyr.

  
Ivpgvzf bs ivbyrag pevzrf "ner abg gur crbcyr lbh jnag gb shegure ivpgvzvmr be
orgenl," fnvq Ebgurvzre, jub nybat jvgu ure qnhtugre, Wnfzvar Wvzrarm, abj 21,
unf svyrq n srqreny ynjfhvg ntnvafg gur [ Ynxr Pbhagl ][20] 'f fgngr'f
nggbearl naq gur fgngr bs Vyyvabvf. Fur ubcrf vg yrnqf gb n cerprqrag gung
cebfrphgbef pna or uryq yrtnyyl nppbhagnoyr.

  
"V nz fnlvat, yrg'f unir n evtug gb or noyr gb ubyq nppbhagnoyr n crefba jub
ivbyngrf be qravrf lbh lbhe evtugf gb whfgvpr, cebfrphgbe be abg," Ebgurvzre
fnvq.

  
Gur Vyyvabvf Pbafgvghgvba nyernql cebivqrf 10 evtugf sbe pevzr ivpgvzf,
vapyhqvat gung gurl or gerngrq jvgu erfcrpg, tvira abgvpr bs pbheg urnevatf
naq or nyybjrq gb nggraq gevnyf naq cerfrag ivpgvz-vzcnpg fgngrzragf.

  
Ohg vs gubfr evtugf ner ivbyngrq, gurer'f ab zrpunavfz sbe n pevzr ivpgvz gb
nccrny gb n uvture pbheg, fnvq Pvaql Uben, jub urnqf gur Vyyvabvf nggbearl
trareny'f pevzr ivpgvz freivprf qvivfvba. Naq Vyyvabvf vf gur bayl fgngr jubfr
pbafgvghgvba fcrpvsvpnyyl cebuvovgf ivpgvzf sebz frrxvat yrtny erzrql guebhtu
na nccrny, Uben fnvq.

  
Abj Vyyvabvf nqibpnpl tebhcf unir wbvarq n angvbany chfu gb nzraq fgngr
pbafgvghgvbaf naq tvir grrgu gb fgnghgrf nyernql ba gur obbxf. Srj funer
Ebgurvzre'f tbny, gb znxr cebfrphgbef crefbanyyl yvnoyr sbe ivbyngvat pevzr
ivpgvzf' evtugf. Ohg zbfg funer n qrfver gb nyybj ivpgvzf n ibvpr qhevat gur
whqvpvny cebprff.

  
Gur Vyyvabvf Pbnyvgvba sbe Rasbeprnoyr Ivpgvzf Evtugf unf cebcbfrq vgf irefvba
bs n pbafgvghgvbany nzraqzrag nccebirq ol Pnyvsbeavn ibgref va 2008, pnyyrq
Znefl'f Ynj.

  
Sbe lrnef, gur pevzvany whfgvpr flfgrz jbexrq ng znxvat gur cebprff snve sbe
gur npphfrq, nqibpngrf fnl. Abj pevzr ivpgvzf jnag zber pbageby jvguva gur
cebprff.

  
Gur oebgure bs zheqre ivpgvz Qbaan Fpuabee, sbe vafgnapr, jbhyq unir yvxrq gb
unir unq vachg ba gur cyrn qrny bssrerq gb pbasrffrq zheqrere Oevna Qhtna jura
ur jnf vavgvnyyl fragraprq va 1985 gb gjb yvsr fragraprf va cevfba sbe gur
zheqref bs Fpuabee naq n 7-lrne-byq tvey. Yngre, Qhtna jnf tvira gur qrngu
cranygl sbe gur zheqre bs Wrnavar Avpnevpb, 10, bs [ Ancreivyyr ][29] , ohg
jnf fcnerq rkrphgvba jura Vyyvabvf nobyvfurq pncvgny chavfuzrag.

  
"Jr jbhyq unir cersreerq gb unir n fnl-fb va gur fragrapvat," fnvq Ebtre
Fpuabee, bs [ Nheben ][27] , jub jnagrq gur qrngu cranygl sbe Qhtna. "Ur
pyrneyl vf gur thvygl cnegl naq qrfreirq zhpu jbefr guna jung ur erprvirq."

  
Bgure fheivibef bs ivbyrag pevzrf pbzcynva gung pbheg fpurqhyrf naq cyrn
onetnvaf ner punatrq jvgubhg gurve xabjyrqtr, fnvq Qvnar Znlsvryq, n ivpgvz
freivprf qverpgbe sbe gur Jrfgrea Vyyvabvf Ertvbany Pbhapvy-Pbzzhavgl Npgvba
Ntrapl va Znpbzo.

  
Znlsvryq erpnyyrq n grrantr tvey jubfr sngure cyrnqrq thvygl gb frkhnyyl
nohfvat ure. Gur grra jnagrq gb ernq ure ivpgvz-vzcnpg fgngrzrag va pbheg, ohg
gur whqtr fnvq ab orpnhfr gur qrsraqnag unq nyernql frra vg.

  
Gur grra jnagrq gb "frr uvf ernpgvba jura fur gbyq uvz ubj jung ur unq qbar gb
ure unq vzcnpgrq ure," Znlsvryq fnvq.

  
Ohg va Vyyvabvf, nyybjvat ivpgvzf n ovttre ebyr va pbheg unf orra
pbagebirefvny.

  
"Va fbzr jnlf, pevzr ivpgvzf ner gur bqq zna bhg va gur pevzvany whfgvpr
flfgrz," fnvq Cnhy Pnffryy, n sbezre srqreny whqtr abj grnpuvat ng gur
Havirefvgl bs Hgnu'f ynj pbyyrtr.

  
"Qrsraqnagf qba'g jnag ivpgvzf vaibyirq va gur pevzvany cebprff orpnhfr gurl
ner nsenvq gur ivpgvz jvyy frrx unefu whfgvpr. Gur cebfrphgbef qba'g yvxr gb
or frpbaq-thrffrq ol ivpgvzf naq ner hfrq gb ehaavat gur fubj va n pevzvany
pnfr."

  
Enzverm, bs Puvpntb'f [ Oevtugba Cnex ][28] arvtuobeubbq, fnvq fur naq ure
zbgure nggraqrq na neenvtazrag va 2006 sbe gur whiravyr npphfrq bs fubbgvat
ure fba. Jura gur obl jnf qravrq onvy, uvf oebgure yhatrq gbjneq Enzverm naq
ure zbgure, lryyvat bofpravgvrf naq guerngravat gung ur jnf "tbvat gb trg"
Enzverm, fur fnvq.

![][2]

Guvf jrrx jr'er ybbxvat ng fbzr bs gur jnlf Pbbx Pbhagl znxrf zbarl jura vg
ybpxf crbcyr hc. Jr'ir frra gung gur pbhagl vf bar bs gubhfnaqf bs tbireazrag
obqvrf va gur H.F. znxvat zvyyvbaf bs qbyynef rnpu lrne sebz gur vasyngrq
cevprf vazngrf naq gurve snzvyvrf cnl sbe cubar pnyyf sebz wnvy.

Gur pbhagl nyfb znxrf zvyyvbaf sebz obaq. Obaq vf gur zbarl n ybg bs
qrsraqnagf ner erdhverq gb cnl - be gurl unir gb fgnl va wnvy hagvy gurve
gevny vf bire. Gur zbarl urycf thnenagrr gurl'yy fubj hc sbe pbheg. Vs gurl
qba'g, gurl'yy ybfr gung zbarl. Ohg ng gur raq bs gur pnfr, gurl fgvyy qba'g
trg nyy bs gung zbarl onpx, rira jura gurl'er sbhaq abg thvygl. Gung'f
unccrarq gb Nagubal Fzvgu n ahzore bs gvzrf.

Va gur fhzzre bs 2010, Fzvgu jnf unatvat bhg jvgu fbzr sevraqf va uvf byq
arvtuobeubbq va Uhzobyqg Cnex. Cbyvpr qebir hc naq Fzvgu xarj bar bs gur
bssvpref orpnhfr ur'q cynlrq onfxrgonyy jvgu uvz jura gur gjb jrer xvqf.

"Lbh xabj V'z guvaxvat, lbh xabj, V xabj guvf thl, lbh xabj vg'f tbaan or
cerggl pbby," fnlf Fzvgu. "Cebonoyl tbaan or dhvpx.  Ur'f whfg tbaan eha bhe
anzrf.  Bu ab, ab, ab.  Gung'f abg jung unccrarq."

Fzvgu fnlf ur jnfa'g qevaxvat,  jnfa'g orvat abvfl, gurer jrer ab pbzcynvagf
nobhg uvz.

"Fb V'z yvxr, zna, jung'f hc Vina?  Lbh xabj jung V'z fnlvat?  Nf va, jung'f
hc?  Jung'f gur ceboyrz?  Lbh xabj, jul ner lbh fgbccvat zr?"

Fzvgu unf cyragl bs pbaivpgvbaf va uvf cnfg, vapyhqvat tha punetrf tbvat onpx
gb uvf grra lrnef, ohg ur fnlf ba guvf qnl, ur jnfa'g qbvat nalguvat jebat.
"Abg gb fnl V'z n pubveobl be abguvat, ohg, vs lbh'er tbvat gb ybpx zr hc,
ybpx zr hc sbe jung V qb," ur fnlf.

Fzvgu'f nggbearl Zryvaqn Cbjre fnlf bs gur pbcf, "V guvax gurl gubhtug, n
ohapu bs Nsevpna Nzrevpna zra fgnaqvat ba gur fgerrg pbeare, bu, gubfr thlf
zhfg or tnat onatref, gurl zhfg unir qehtf, gurl zhfg unir thaf. Bs pbhefr,
abgnoyl, ab thaf be qehtf jrer sbhaq orpnhfr abobql tbg neerfgrq sbe gung, gur
zbfg gurl tbg neerfgrq sbe vf qevaxvat ba gur choyvp jnl."

Fzvgu fnlf gur rapbhagre rfpnyngrq naq ur fnlf gur bssvpref fznfurq uvf snpr
ntnvafg gur pne. Ur jnf oebhtug gb gur fgngvba jurer ur fnlf ur jnf gnmrerq
naq ebhturq hc fbzr zber. Ur jnf punetrq jvgu qevaxvat ba n choyvp jnl naq
nffnhygvat na bssvpre naq gnxra gb pbhagl wnvy. Gb trg bhg, ur unq gb cbfg n
$1,500 obaq. Gung zbarl vf fhccbfrq gb rafher gung ur fubjf hc sbe pbheg naq
nafjref sbe gur punetrf. Vg gbbx n lrne naq n unys sbe gur pnfr gb tb gb
gevny. Nsgre gur cebfrphgbef chg ba gurve rivqrapr naq orsber gur qrsrafr rira
chg ba gurve pnfr gur whqtr qrpynerq Fzvgu abg thvygl.

"Gur pnfr jnf fb obthf ur qvqa'g jnag gb urne ab zber," fnlf Fzvgu.

Cbjre rkcynvaf, "Ubj pna lbh oryvrir nal bssvpre gung fnlf V fgbccrq gurz
orpnhfr V pbhyq frr ur unq ibqxn va n cynfgvp phc?  Gung'f ynhtunoyr sebz gur
ortvaavat orpnhfr lbh xabj abobql pna gryy jung ibqxn vf pnhfr vg'f n pyrne-
gubhtu fhofgnapr."

Cbjre fnlf gur bssvpre nyfb tnir grfgvzbal gung jnf qvssrerag guna jung jnf va
gur cbyvpr ercbeg.

Fb univat orra sbhaq vaabprag naq fubja hc sbe pbheg, Fzvgu tbg uvf obaq
zbarl, ohg abg nyy bs vg. Gurer jnf n 10 creprag cebprffvat srr gnxra bhg ol
gur bssvpr bs gur Pbbx Pbhagl Pyrex bs Pbheg, Qbebgul Oebja.

"V qbar tbg orng hc, anzr qenttrq guebhtu gur zhq, tbg gb trg hc naq tb gb
pbheg, V'z abg rira n zbeavat crefba, V ungr gb trg hc rneyl va gur zbeavat.
V tbg gb trg hc rneyl va gur zbeavat naq fubj hc ba pbheg ba gvzr naq V tbggn
fgnaq urer naq yvfgra gb crbcyr gnyx nobhg zl shgher naq V pna'g fnl nalguvat,
naq gura ng gur raq jura V jva, lbh xabj jung V'z fnlvat, V fubhyq or noyr gb
pryroengr naq or yvxr, url V jba, V'z trggvat nyy zl zbarl onpx." fnlf Fzvgu.
"Ab, V fgvyy trg fynccrq va gur snpr.  Ab lbh pna'g rira unir nyy lbhe zbarl
onpx.  Gunaxf sbe pbzvat.  Frr lbh arkg gvzr."

Gra creprag bs Fzvgu'f 15 uhaqerq qbyyne obaq vf n uhaqerq naq svsgl qbyynef.
Nsgre orvat sbhaq abg thvygl, ur unq gb cnl gung nf n cebprffvat srr, naq nf
na nfvqr, vs ur'q cbfgrq uvf obaq ba n perqvg pneq ur jbhyq unir orra fghat
sbe nabgure 9 creprag. Vg'f yvxr ur unq gb cnl sbe gur cyrnfher bs orvat
neerfgrq, qrgnvarq naq cebfrphgrq. Ur hfrq gur flfgrz fb ur fubhyq uryc cnl
sbe vg.

Fzvgu unf unq gb cnl gur 10 creprag obaq srr va n ahzore bs pnfrf jurer ur jnf
sbhaq abg thvygl, naq ntnva, gurer ner cyragl bs pnfrf jurer ur unf orra
thvygl. Ohg jr'er gnyxvat urer nobhg jung gur flfgrz  fubhyq qb va na vafgnapr
jurer n whqtr be whel unir ybbxrq ng nyy gur rivqrapr naq sbhaq n qrsraqnag
abg thvygl. Va bar pnfr jurer Fzvgu jnf abg thvygl ur cbfgrq n $5,000 obaq.
Gur 10 creprag srr ba gung vf $500.

"Tbvat guebhtu nyy gung fgerff, gura lbh fgvyy tbg gb tvir gur pbhagl 500 zber
qbyynef bs lbhe zbarl.  Jul fubhyq na vaabprag zna unir gb cnl lbh svir
uhaqerq qbyynef?  V qba'g frr jung'f snve.  Jul fubhyq lbh trg 10 creprag?
Jung lbh tbaan qb jvgu zl rkgen svir uhaqerq qbyynef?" fnlf Fzvgu.

V gbbx Fzvgu'f fvghngvba naq dhrfgvbaf naq chg gurz gb Pbbx Pbhagl Pyrex bs
Pbheg Qbebgul Oebja. Fur'f pheeragyl ehaavat gb xrrc gung wbo va arkg
Ghrfqnl'f cevznel ryrpgvba. Ure Qrzbpengvp punyyratre vf Puvpntb Nyqrezna Evp
Zhabm. Vg'f Oebja'f bssvpr gung nqzvavfgref gur obaq flfgrz naq punetrf gur 10
creprag. V gnyxrq gb Oebja sbe whfg n srj zvahgrf naq urer'f n genafpevcgvba
bs bhe pbairefngvba.

JVYQROBRE: "Vg'f n cebprffvat srr naq V xabj gurer'f pbfg vaibyirq ohg jura
gur crefba'f abg thvygl ubj pna gur pbhagl whfgvsl xrrcvat gung?"

OEBJA: "Abj lbh whfg nafjrerq lbhe bja dhrfgvba.  Lbh fnvq vg'f n cebprffvat
srr naq gurer ner pbfgf vaibyirq fb abj jub rknpgyl cnlf gur pbfg sbe gung
cebprffvat srr naq gung pbfg, bgure guna gur vaqvivqhny gung jr cebprff vg
sbe, jurgure gung vf gur crefba gung vf sbhaq vaabprag be thvygl.  Gur obaqf
ner znvagnvarq gur fnzr jnl, jr fgvyy unir gb unir gubfr rzcyblrrf, gurl fgvyy
unir gb cebprff vg. Naq fb rvgure gur gnkcnlref pna qb naq jr qba'g jnag gb
envfr gnkrf ba gnkcnlref be gur hfref, juvpu jbhyq or gur vaqvivqhny, naq
hasbeghangryl naq V ernyyl haqrefgnaq naq erfcrpg jung lbh'er fnlvat pnhfr V
ungr jura crbcyr ner neerfgrq naq gurl'er npghnyyl vaabprag nf jryy, naq V
xabj, bs pbhefr V unir rkchatrzrag fhzzvgf orpnhfr bs gubfr xvaqf bs
guvatf..."

JVYQROBRE: "Fb, fb, whfg gb pynevsl, V zrna, lbh qba'g guvax gung vg'f
shaqnzragnyyl hasnve gung na vaabprag crefba jbhyq fgvyy unir gb cnl n
cebprffvat srr jura gurl fubhyqa'g unir orra cebprffrq va gur svefg cynpr?"

OEBJA: "Nf V fnvq, gur ceboyrz vf gung gurl unq gb or cebprffrq naq fbzrbar,
gur fnzr pbfgf ner vaibyirq jurer gur crefba vf sbhaq vaabprag be thvygl.
Vg'f na hasbeghangr pvephzfgnapr, vg’f gur flfgrz gung jr unir evtug abj, ohg
fbzrbar unf gb cnl gung pbfg naq V jbhyqa'g jnag gb envfr gnkrf ba gur
gnkcnlref gb cnl gung pbfg sbe vaqvivqhnyf gung ner sbhaq vaabprag."

Nppbeqvat gb ahzoref cebivqrq ol Oebja'f bssvpr, gurl oevat va $6 gb $7
zvyyvba rirel lrne sebz gubfr 10 creprag srrf, gubhtu gurl qba'g unir nal vqrn
ubj znal bs gubfr crbcyr jrer vaabprag naq ubj znal jrer thvygl orpnhfr gurl
qba'g genpx gung. Gb tvir lbh fbzr vqrn bs gur ibyhzr, gubhtu, 116,000 crbcyr
cbfgrq obaq guebhtu gur bssvpr va 2010.

Gur ynj nyybjvat sbe gur 10 creprag cebprffvat srr vf n fgngr ynj naq jnf
vzcyrzragrq va gur 1960f, jryy orsber Oebja'f gvzr va bssvpr. Gur pheerag
flfgrz vf npghnyyl na vzcebirzrag bire gur byq onvy obaqfzna flfgrz, jurer
crbcyr unq gb chg hc, naq ybfr, zhpu ynetre fhzf bs zbarl guna gurl qb gbqnl.
Abarguryrff, sbe Nagubal Fzvgu, vg fgvyy obguref uvz jura ur unf gb cnl srrf,
rira jura ur'f vaabprag.

  
"Lbh tbggn cnl obaq.  Lbh tbggn cnl n ynjlre.  Gura lbh tbggn fubj hc gb
pbheg.  Lbh fubj hc gb pbheg, lbh gur bayl sbby gung nva'g trggvat cnvq.  Gur
whqtr trg cnvq.  Lbhe ynjlre tbgf gb trg cnvq.  Fgngr'f nggbearlf trggvat
cnvq.  Pbcf, gvzr naq n unys nyy qnl naq gurl bayl gurer sbe 20, 30 zvahgrf.
V srry yvxr n sbby fbzrgvzrf jura V tbggn tb fvg va pbheg, " Fzvgu fnlf.
"Fbzrgvzr zl ynjlre nfxf zr gb svk zl snpr, ohg vg'f uneq gb svk lbhe snpr
jura lbh fvggva' gurer naq rirelbar nebhaq lbh vf trggvat cnvq, naq gura jura
vg nyy obvyf qbja gb vg, rirelobql'f tbaan tb ubzr.  Lbh'er gur bar jub tbva'
gb wnvy."

Fzvgu rpubrf n plavpvfz gung V urne sebz n ybg bs crbcyr tbvat guebhtu gur
pbhegf, gung fbzrgvzrf gur whfgvpr flfgrz frrzf zber vagrerfgrq va zbarl guna
whfgvpr.

Senapvar Ebqevthrm vf eryvrirq gung na neerfg unf orra znqr va gur nefba gung

  * [ 4246 J 63eq Fg, Puvpntb, VY 60629, HFN ][2]

Ol Naavr Fjrrarl, Puvpntb Gevohar ercbegre

Znepu 23, 2012

Gjb zbaguf nsgre Wnzrf Znpn crevfurq va na nefba sver, ur vf fgvyy erzrzorerq
sbaqyl arne uvf ubzr va gur Jrfg Ynja arvtuobeubbq.

  
Ba 63eq Fgerrg, gurl chyyrq uvf Znff pneq sebz birefghssrq jnyyrgf naq nqqerff
obbxf naq fzvyrq naq ynhturq Guhefqnl nobhg gur thl gurl pnyyrq "Wvzzl Obbgf"
be whfg "Obbgf." Ur jnf n pbhegrbhf zna jvgu n erthyne fgbby ng gur ybpny one
jub pbhyq trg vagb n tbbq qvfnterrzrag bire uvf orybirq Ornef -- lrg arire
uryq n tehqtr.

  
Naq gurl jrypbzrq gur arjf gung n Pvpreb zna unq orra punetrq va gur sver gung
xvyyrq Znpn. N pevzvany pbzcynvag znqr choyvp Guhefqnl punetrq gung Whna
Nqnzr, 38, frg gur oynmr va natre bire n oernxhc jvgu n tveysevraq jub yvirq
arkg qbbe gb Znpn. Fur jnf abg gurer gung avtug.

  
"Lbh xabj gurl pnhtug gur crbcyr jub xvyyrq Obbgf," Senapvar Ebqevthrm fnvq
rkpvgrqyl va n cubar pnyy gb ure obff ng gur Fhqf Snpgbel, n ynhaqebzng jurer
Znpn jnfurq uvf pybgurf, nsgre urnevat gur arjf. "V'z fb unccl."

  
Qhevat na nccrnenapr va srqreny pbheg Guhefqnl, Nqnzr, bs gur 3600 oybpx bs
Fbhgu 52aq Pbheg va gur jrfg fhoheo, jnf beqrerq uryq va phfgbql ng yrnfg
hagvy n qrgragvba urnevat gragngviryl fpurqhyrq sbe arkg jrrx.

  
Uvf yrtf funpxyrq nf n cerpnhgvba, Nqnzr, jub nhgubevgvrf fnvq jnf nyfb xabja
nf Wnvzr Tnepvn, fubjrq ab ernpgvba nf Nffvfgnag H.F. Nggbearl Zvpuryyr Anffre
rkcynvarq n pbaivpgvba sbe gur srqreny nefba punetr cbgragvnyyl pneevrq gur
qrngu cranygl.

  
Gur pbzcynvag ynlf bhg n ynetryl pvephzfgnagvny pnfr ntnvafg Nqnzr, jub jnf
neerfgrq Jrqarfqnl ol ntragf sebz gur H.F. [ Ohernh bs Nypbuby, Gbonppb,
Svernezf naq Rkcybfvirf ][3] . [ Puvpntb ][4] cbyvpr naq gur Vyyvabvf Fgngr
Sver Znefuny nyfb nffvfgrq va gur vairfgvtngvba.

  
Vairfgvtngbef nyyrtrq gung Nqnzr gnetrgrq gur ohvyqvat ng 4246 J. 63eq Fg.
orpnhfr uvf tveysevraq bsgra fgnlrq gurer ba jrrxraqf. Gur gjb unq qngrq fvapr
Nhthfg, ohg va yngr Qrprzore naq rneyl Wnahnel, Nqnzr orpnzr hcfrg jvgu ure
nsgre fur naabhaprq cynaf gb ivfvg n fvpx eryngvir va [ Zrkvpb ][5] , jurer
fur unq na rk-oblsevraq, nppbeqvat gb gur pbzcynvag.

  
Gur jbzna, jub nyfb yvirq va abegujrfg Vaqvnan, qvfpbirerq rneyl Wna. 14 gung
ure pne naq fbzr crefbany orybatvatf jrer zvffvat sebz gung erfvqrapr.
Fhfcrpgvat Nqnzr, fur frag grkg zrffntrf fnlvat fur jnf yrnivat sbe Zrkvpb naq
jnagrq abguvat zber gb qb jvgu uvz, nhgubevgvrf fnvq.

  
Va gur ubhef orsber gur sver nobhg 4:30 n.z. Wna. 14, Nqnzr jnf bhg jvgu na
rk-tveysevraq naq fgbccrq ng n tnf fgngvba, nppbeqvat gb gur pbzcynvag. Nqnzr
gbyq ure ur arrqrq gb cvpx hc fbzr guvatf naq gura qverpgrq ure gb n ybpngvba
nobhg bar oybpx sebz gur 63eq Fgerrg ncnegzrag, cebfrphgbef fnvq. Nqnzr jnf
tbar sbe nobhg gjb ubhef -- gur jbzna sryy nfyrrc juvyr jnvgvat, cebfrphgbef
fnvq.

  
Nsgre gur sver oebxr bhg, fnvq Ebqevthrm, Znpn'f sevraq, n jbzna sebz n ornhgl
cneybe npebff gur fgerrg fnj Znpn jnivat senagvpnyyl sebz uvf ynetr, sebag
jvaqbj gung ybbxf bhg ba 63eq Fgerrg. Arvtuobef thrff gung Znpn jnf nsenvq gb
whzc; bguref fnl ur jrag onpx sbe uvf orybirq pngf.

  
Nhgubevgvrf yngre qrgrezvarq ur qvrq bs fzbxr vaunyngvba naq pneoba zbabkvqr
vagbkvpngvba.

  
N fgngr sver znefuny pnavar qrgrpgrq tnfbyvar va sbhe ybpngvbaf bs gur
ncnegzrag. Vairfgvtngbef nyfb qrgrezvarq gung abar bs gur pybguvat Nqnzr unq
xrcg ng gur ncnegzrag pbhyq or sbhaq gurer nsgre gur sver.

  
Arjf bs Nqnzr'f neerfg fcernq nybat 63eq Fgerrg ba Guhefqnl nsgreabba.

  
Nppbeqvat gb sevraqf, Znpn fng sbe lrnef ng gur pheir va gur one ng gur Zvqjnl
Ybhatr gb rawbl n orre naq n pung jvgu uvf sevraqf.

  
Ur nyfb jnf n erthyne ng Fhqf, jngpuvat "Snzvyl Srhq" naq JTA Arjf. Ebqevthrm
fnvq fur funerq znal na nsgreabba jvgu uvz. Jrrxf orsber uvf qrngu, ur tnir
ure n Ornef xrl punva -- jvgu uvf anzr ba gur onpx -- gung fur fgvyy pneevrf.

  
Jnlar Cncebpxv, 53, fnvq Znpn jnf bsgra frra fvggvat ba n ynja punve ba gur
ohfl fgevc bs 63eq Fgerrg, ernqvat uvf arjfcncre naq jngpuvat gur genssvp tb
ol.

  
Cncebpxv tnmrq bhg gur fvqr qbbe bs gur Zvqjnl ba Znpn'f abj obneqrq-hc
ncnegzrag.

  
"Ubj pbhyq lbh qb fbzrguvat yvxr gung?" ur nfxrq, bs Nqnzr. "Lbh'er tbvat gb
gbepu n ohvyqvat?"

Ol Ebfrznel Fboby, Yvnz Sbeq naq Ybyyl Objrna  Gevohar ercbegref

4:59 c.z. PQG  ,  Znepu 27, 2012

Na 80-lrne-byq gnirea bjare va Ratyrjbbq oryvrirf vg'f "hawhfg" gung ur vf
snpvat punetrf nsgre fubbgvat n ohetyne, ohg oryvrirf ur jvyy cerinvy va
pbheg.

  
"Vg'f jebat," Ubzre "Gnax" Jevtug fnvq nf ur jnyxrq vagb uvf one nsgre orvat
eryrnfrq sebz wnvy guvf nsgreabba. "Hawhfg gung V pna'g cebgrpg zr."

  
Njnxrarq ol uvf 75-lrne-byq jvsr, Jevtug pbasebagrq n 19-lrne-byq ohetyne jub
unq oebxra guebhtu fbzr cyljbbq bire n onguebbz jvaqbj va ubcrf bs fgrnyvat
yvdhbe, nppbeqvat gb cbyvpr. Jevtug tenoorq uvf 38.pnyvore cvfgby, ybnqrq jvgu
sbhe ebhaqf, naq fubg gur vagehqre va gur yrt.

  
Gur fhfcrpg jnf neerfgrq -- ohg fb jnf Jevtug. Orpnhfr bs cevbe jrncbaf
pbaivpgvbaf, Jevtug jnf punetrq jvgu haynjshy hfr bs n jrncba, fcnexvat pnyyf
ol uvf snzvyl naq arvtuobef sbe cebfrphgbef gb onpx qbja.

  
"Vs fbzrobql oernxf vagb n cynpr jurer gurl ner abg fhccbfrq gb or, V org
fbzrguvat jvyy unccra," Jevtug fnvq, nqqvat gung ur jnf natel nobhg gur
neerfg. "Gung'f jebat."

  
Gur Nezl irgrena fnvq uvf jvsr jbxr uvz nobhg 4 n.z.ng gurve ubzr ba gur 6400
oybpx bs Fbhgu Zbetna Fgerrg orpnhfr fur urneq abvfr va gur onguebbz. Jura ur
tbg gurer, ur fnvq ur fnj n funqbj syrrvat. N srj ubhef yngre, gurl urneq zber
abvfr naq guvf gvzr ur fnj gur vagehqre naq fubg uvz, Jevtug fnvq.

  
Gur grra penjyrq onpx bhg gur onguebbz jvaqbj naq ena bss ohg pbyyncfrq qbja
gur nyyrl, jurer cbyvpr naq cnenzrqvpf sbhaq gur grra, Jevtug fnvq.

  
Jevtug fnvq uvf one unf orra oebxra vagb sbhe gb fvk gvzrf, naq ur naq uvf
jvsr unq fgnegrq fgnlvat bireavtug ng gur cebcregl gb cebgrpg vg. "Guvf vf bhe
yvivat," ur fnvq, nqqvat gung ur unf unq gevcyr olcnff fhetrel. "V'z tbvat gb
or urer. V'z abg yrnivat. Guvf vf jurer V'z cynaavat gb fgnl."

  
Nagubal Ebovafba, bs gur 6000 oybpx bs Fbhgu Jbbq Fgerrg, jnf punetrq jvgu
srybal ohetynel nsgre ur jnf gerngrq ng Fg. Oreaneq Ubfcvgny naq Urnygu Pner
Pragre naq eryrnfrq. Jrnevat n juvgr-naq-oyhr ubfcvgny tbja naq uvf yrsg unaq
jenccrq va n onaqntr, Ebovafba yvzcrq vagb obaq pbheg guvf nsgreabba naq jnf
beqrerq uryq ba $150,000 obaq.

  
Jevtug jnf punetrq jvgu bar srybal pbhag bs haynjshy hfr bs n jrncba nsgre
cbyvpr qvfpbirerq ur unq gjb cevbe jrncbaf pbaivpgvbaf sebz 1968 naq 1994,
bssvpvnyf fnvq. Erpbeqf fubj Jevtug nyfb jnf pbaivpgrq bs gursg va 1990. Va
gur 1990 naq 1994 pnfrf, Jevtug tbg cebongvba.

  
Jevtug pyhgpurq n gna onfronyy ung nf ur nccrnerq va pbheg qerffrq va n oyhr-
naq juvgr-fgevcrq cbyb fuveg naq xunxv cnagf.Gur whqtr beqrerq uvz eryrnfrq ba
uvf bja erpbtavmnapr, naq ur jnyxrq bhg bs gur pbhegubhfr ng nobhg 2:15 c.z.
jvgu uvf pbheg-nccbvagrq nggbearl, Nffvfgnag Choyvp Qrsraqre Nanaq Fhaqnenz.

  
Frireny bs Jevtug'f eryngvirf purrerq va gur tnyyrel nsgre gur whqtr beqrerq
uvz eryrnfrq, qenjvat n erohxr sebz qrchgvrf.

  
Nsgre gur urnevat, Jevtug'f tenaqfba Pbhegarl Pbbx fnvq uvf tenaqsngure unf
gur evtug gb cebgrpg uvf ubzr naq gur gnirea ur unf eha sbe 40 lrnef.

  
"Lbh unir gb ybbx ng jung'f evtug naq jung'f jebat va gung fvghngvba," ur
fnvq. "Ur'f fhccbfrq gb cebgrpg uvf ubzr naq uvf snzvyl. V zrna, lbh xabj, vf
ur fhccbfrq gb or gur ivpgvz? V zrna, lbh xabj, whfg yrg vg xrrc unccravat? Vs
vg'f tbvat gb xrrc unccravat, gura jurer'f gur ynj? Jung tbbq vf gur ynj?

  
"Rirelobql znxrf zvfgnxrf, ohg rirelobql vf abg fhccbfrq gb or chfurq nebhaq
naq yrg rirelobql qb jung gurl jnag gb qb gb gurz."

  
Ba uvf Fbhgu Fvqr oybpx, Jevtug vf xabja nf n uneq-jbexvat arvtuobe jub ehaf n
one gung unf orpbzr n arvtuobeubbq vafgvghgvba. Xabja nf "Gnax," Jevtug unf
bcrengrq gur one arkg gb uvf ubzr sbe zber guna 40 lrnef, arvtuobef fnvq.

  
"Ur qbrfa'g svqqyr nebhaq naq ur'f fgevpgyl ohfvarff," fnvq Qryzne Qhaa, jub
bcrengrf n oneore fubc npebff gur fgerrg sebz gur one. "Ur gevrf gb xrrc beqre
naq ur gbyrengrf ab sbbyvfuarff. Ur'f abg na ntterffvir zna, fb V'z fhecevfrq
ur fubg. Ur zhfg unir orra cerggl nsenvq be pbaprearq sbe uvf bja fnsrgl."

  
Navgn Qbzvavdhr, urnq bs gur oybpx pyho va gur arvtuobeubbq, fnvq fur unf
xabja Jevtug sbe zber guna 30 lrnef. "Ur vf n cvyyne bs bhe pbzzhavgl," fur
fnvq. "Jung qbrf vg fnl gb zr naq bgure fravbe pvgvmraf gung jr jvyy or

Arvtuobef uryq n arjf pbasrerapr guvf zbeavat gb pnyy ba cebfrphgbef gb qebc
gur punetrf.

  
"Vs n zna pna'g qrsraq uvzfrys sebz unez, jung pna ur qb?" nfxrq Qneely Fzvgu.
"Vs ur unqa'g qrsraqrq uvzfrys, jr jbhyq or urer sbe n qvssrerag ernfba --
orpnhfr na vagehqre pnzr va naq xvyyrq uvz.

  
"Jr'er bhgentrq nf n pbzzhavgl naq jr'er pnyyvat sbe gur fgngr'f nggbearl'f
bssvpr gb qebc gur punetrf," ur nqqrq. "Guvf zna unf qbar abguvat jebat."

  
Fzvgu fnvq cbyvpr naq cebfrphgbef fubhyq unir sbhaq n jnl gb nibvq punetvat
Jevtug. "Whfg gnxr gur tha," Fzvgu fnvq.

  
Fcrnxvat gb ercbegref Ghrfqnl ng na haeryngrq arjf pbasrerapr, Znlbe [ Enuz
Rznahry ][1] qrpyvarq gb gnyx nobhg Jevtug'f neerfg. "V pnaabg pbzzrag ba vg

2005 fubbgbhg jvgu Puvpntb Cbyvpr gung yrsg uvz frireryl jbhaqrq. Abj, n
sbezre envyebnq ntrag naq cbyvpr bssvpre unf orra fragraprq gb 40 lrnef oruvaq
onef.

Ubjneq Zbetna jnf pbaivpgrq bs fubbgvat naq vawhevat gjb Puvpntb Cbyvpr
bssvpref qhevat n genssvp fgbc.

Zbetna jnf fubg 28 gvzrf ol gur bssvpref. Uvf snzvyl vf ibjvat gb nccrny uvf
fragrapr.

Fbzr pbafvqre gur 40-lrne cevfba fragrapr n whqtr tnir Zbetna gur evtug
chavfuzrag sbe gur pevzr. Ur pbhyq unir erprvirq hc gb 80 lrnef. Fgvyy, gur
snzvyl naq fhccbegref bs gur sbezre Puvpntb Cbyvpr bssvpre fnl Guhefqnl
nsgreabba'f qrpvfvba jnf n zvfpneevntr bs whfgvpr.

"V jbhyq whfg yvxr fbzr whfgvpr sbe zl uhfonaq," fnvq Ebfnyva Zbetna.

N grneshy Ebfnyvaq Zbetna jnf ernpgvat gb gur 40-lrne cevfba fragrapr tvira gb
ure uhfonaq.

"Bhe snzvyl vf va cnva, naq evtug abj jung'f vzcbegnag vf gb serr Ubjneq
Zbetna naq oevat uvz ubzr," fnvq Vnar Wraavatf-Zbetna, Ubjneq Zbetna'f
qnhtugre.

N abj 61-lrne-byq Zbetna fng dhvrgyl va pbheg, fnlvat orsber Pbbx Pbhagl Whqtr
Pynlgba Penar unaqrq qbja n fragrapr va pbaarpgvba jvgu gur 2005 vapvqrag,
"Tbq oyrff zl jvsr naq snzvyl. Vg'f nyy va Tbq'f unaqf."

Zbetna jnf na bssvpre sbe gur Oheyvatgba Abegurea Fnagn Sr Yvar naq jnf bss-
qhgl jura ur jnf chyyrq bire ol bssvpref sbe qevivat gur jebat jnl ba n bar-
jnl fgerrg.

Jung unccrarq arkg qrcraqf ba jub lbh nfx.

"Ur chyyrq bhg n tha naq fubg ng bssvpref 17 gvzrf," fnvq Zvpunry Fuvryqf,
ercerfragvat gur Sengreany Beqre bs Cbyvpr. "Ur uvg guerr bssvpref. Ur
qrfreirf gb tb gb cevfba."

Cebfrphgbef fnl Zbetna, n sbezre Puvpntb pbc uvzfrys, ortna fubbgvat ng
bssvpref jura gurl gevrq gb neerfg uvz, ohg uvf fhccbegref fnl gur vapvqrag
naq ireqvpg fznpxf bs enpvfz.

"Gurer jrer bayl gjb Nsevpna Nzrevpnaf ba gur whel, naq gur erfg bs gurz
juvgr," fnvq Zbetna fhccbegre Mbr Lbhat. "Gurer vf na vawhfgvpr gb gung."

Qhevat uvf ivpgvz'f vzcnpg fgngrzrag, Bssvpre Wbua Jevtyrl natevyl fnvq, nf
qbmraf bs uvf sryybj bssvpref ybbxrq ba, "Lbh fubg zr, Ze. Zbetna. Lbh pnzr
pybfr gb raqvat zl yvsr."

Zbetna jnf ubfcvgnyvmrq sbe frira zbaguf naq jnf yngre punetrq jvgu nggrzcgrq
zheqre, ntteningrq onggrel naq ntteningrq qvfpunetr bs n svernez ng n cbyvpr
bssvpre.

Va 2007, n whel npdhvggrq Zbetna bs zbfg bs gur punetrf, ohg qrnqybpxrq ba gur
nggrzcgrq zheqre punetrf. N whqtrq qrpynerq n zvfgevny naq Zbetna jnf gevrq
ntnva.

Guvf gvzr ur jnf sbhaq thvygl bs nggrzcgrq zheqre. Gur whel jnf abg nyybjrq gb
urne nobhg Zbetna'f cevbe npdhvggny.

"Jura n whqtr qvfertneqf n ynj gung jnf jevggra naq cnffrq, naq lrg fnlf
qbhoyr wrbcneql vf abg qbhoyr wrbcneql," fnvq Ovfubc Pbaavr Onafn, Zbetna'f
cnfgbe.

Fhccbegref bs Ubjneq Zbetna fnl whebef qvq abg urne nyy gur rivqrapr naq gung
ur jnf arire grfgrq sbe tha erfvqhr.

Gur tebhc, Punatr.bet, unf ortha n crgvgvba qevir gb trg Zbetna'f pbaivpgvba
bireghearq.

Zbetna'f snzvyl vf chefhvat n pvivy ynjfhvg va srqreny pbheg ntnvafg gur
bssvpref.

Gur bgure qbt bjaref gbbx cubgbtencuf bs gur zna jvgu gurve pryy cubarf, naq

Obyvatoebbx cbyvpr bssvpre'f zheqre gevny.

Crgrefba'f qebjarq rk-jvsr,  Fnivb  , naq zvffvat sbhegu jvsr, [ Fgnpl

Fgnpl gb fcrnx sebz gur tenir. Ur rira chfurq sbe n arj Vyyvabvf fgnghgr --

Ol [ Fgrir Zvyyf ][7] , Puvpntb Gevohar ercbegre

10:48 c.z. PQG  ,  Znl 31, 2012

N zna jub fcrag arneyl n dhnegre-praghel oruvaq onef sbe uvf pbaivpgvba sbe
frggvat n 1984 sver gung xvyyrq n jbzna naq ure svir puvyqera jvyy or eryrnfrq
sebz cevfba nsgre Pbbx Pbhagl cebfrphgbef harkcrpgrqyl qebccrq gur pnfr
ntnvafg uvz.

  
Wnzrf Xyhccryoret, 46, jub bapr snprq gur qrngu cranygl va gur pnfr, jnf
pbaivpgrq bs frggvat gur Znepu 1984 sver gung xvyyrq 28-lrne-byq Ryin Yhcrepvb
naq ure svir puvyqera, ntrf 3 gb 10, ng gurve ubzr va gur 4400 oybpx bs Fbhgu
Urezvgntr Nirahr va gur Onpx bs gur Lneqf arvtuobeubbq.

  
Fnagbf Yhcrepvb, Ryin'f uhfonaq naq gur sngure bs gur puvyqera, fheivirq gur
sver. Ur pbhyq abg or ernpurq Jrqarfqnl.

  
Xney Yrbaneq bs gur ynj svez Jvafgba & Fgenja fnvq ur cynaarq gb geniry gb
Zraneq Pbeerpgvbany Pragre gbqnl naq oevat uvf pyvrag ubzr -- gubhtu cevfba
bssvpvnyf fnvq vg jnf abg pyrne jura Xyhccryoret jbhyq or eryrnfrq.

  
Yrbaneq fnvq ur fcbxr jvgu Xyhccryoret nsgre gur urnevat Jrqarfqnl naq unq
rkcrpgrq gung cevfba bssvpvnyf nyernql jbhyq unir abgvsvrq Xyhccryoret gung ur
jnf tbvat gb or eryrnfrq.

  
Xyhccryoret, ubjrire, jnf fhecevfrq ol gur arjf.

  
"Ur jnf oybja njnl," Yrbaneq fnvq. "Ur fnvq ur unq orra cenlvat sbe vg sbe n
ybat gvzr, naq ur pbhyqa'g oryvrir vg jnf svanyyl gehr."

  
Nygubhtu gur sver jnf vavgvnyyl ehyrq nppvqragny ol gur Cbyvpr Qrcnegzrag'f
Obzo naq Nefba Havg, gur pnhfr bs gur oynmr jnf punatrq ol sversvtugref gb
nefba -- nygubhtu ab ercbegf bs n Sver Qrcnegzrag vairfgvtngvba jrer jevggra.
Cbyvpr fnvq Xyhccryoret pbasrffrq gb gur pevzr nsgre orvat yvaxrq gb bgure
sverf.

  
Ohg gur pbasrffvba jnf ehyrq vanqzvffvoyr va pbheg orpnhfr vg unq orra
pbreprq, naq vg jnf abg hfrq ng Xyhccryoret'f gevny.

  
Xyhccryoret jnf pbaarpgrq gb gur sver ol n sevraq ur yvirq jvgu, n guerr-gvzr
pbaivpgrq ohetyne jub fnvq gung ur fnj Xyhccryoret tb onpx naq sbegu gb gur
Yhcrepvb ubzr naq gung Xyhccryoret gbyq uvz: "Lbh xabj ubj V nz jura V srry
V'z ybfvat fbzrbar. V qb fghcvq guvatf."

  
Xyhccryoret znvagnvarq uvf vaabprapr sebz gur ortvaavat. Ba nccrny, uvf
nggbearlf nethrq gung gur oynmr jnf abg rira na nefba, fnlvat gung nqinaprf va
fpvrapr nsgre Xyhccryoret'f pbaivpgvba punatrq ubj bssvpvnyf vairfgvtngrq
sverf. Nzbat gubfr nqinaprf: Vaqvpngbef gung vairfgvtngbef ybat oryvrirq zrnag
n sver unq orra vagragvbanyyl frg fvzcyl jrer fvtaf bs n oynmr gung ohearq
rfcrpvnyyl ubg be jrag gb synfubire naq rkcybqrq.

  
N 2004 Gevohar frevrf, "Sberafvpf Haqre gur Zvpebfpbcr," rknzvarq gur nqinaprf
va sver fpvrapr naq ubj gur hfr bs qrohaxrq nefba vaqvpngbef unq yrq gb
cbffvoyr jebatshy pbaivpgvbaf bs uhaqerqf, vs abg gubhfnaqf, bs crbcyr. Va n
sbyybj-hc fgbel, gur Gevohar ercbegrq ba gur rkrphgvba bs n Grknf zna, Pnzreba
Gbqq Jvyyvatunz, rira gubhtu sver vairfgvtngbef hfrq gur fnzr qrohaxrq
gurbevrf gb jva uvf pbaivpgvba.

  
Gur sevraq jub vzcyvpngrq Xyhccryoret yngre nqzvggrq ur unq yvrq orpnhfr ur
jnf snpvat uvf bja pevzvany punetrf.

  
Qrsrafr nggbearlf nyfb pynvzrq cebfrphgbef unq snvyrq gb ghea bire vasbezngvba
nobhg n jbzna jub unq frg n sver n oybpx sebz gur Yhcrepvb ubzr ba gur fnzr
avtug. Gung jbzna pbasrffrq gb gur bgure sver naq gbyq cbyvpr fur jnf gbb
qehax gb erzrzore vs fur unq frg gur Yhcrepvb sver nf jryy.

  
Xyhccryoret jnf fragraprq gb yvsr va cevfba jura n whqtr erwrpgrq gur qrngu
cranygl va gur pnfr. Orsber gur fragrapr jnf vzcbfrq, ubjrire, Xyhccryoret jnf
zvfgnxrayl eryrnfrq sebz Pbbx Pbhagl Wnvy naq znqr uvf jnl gb Trbetvn, jurer
ur jnf pncgherq naq erghearq gb wnvy. N wnvy thneq jnf yngre punetrq jvgu
urycvat Xyhccryoret tb serr; cbyvpr fnvq ur qvq fb nsgre Xyhccryoret urycrq
uvz bognva pbpnvar.

  
Pbbx Pbhagl cebfrphgbef unq orra punyyratvat gur nccrny rssbegf, ohg ba
Jrqarfqnl gurl gbyq n whqtr gurl jnagrq gb qvfzvff gur punetrf.

  
Fnyyl Qnyl, n fcbxrfjbzna sbe Fgngr'f Nggbearl [ Navgn Nyinerm ][8] , fnvq gur
qrpvfvba gb qvfzvff gur punetrf sbyybjrq n "pbzcerurafvir cbfg-pbaivpgvba
ervairfgvtngvba" gung vapyhqrq uvevat na rkcreg gb rinyhngr gur sberafvp
rivqrapr. Gung erivrj, fnvq Qnyl, yrq cebfrphgbef gb pbapyhqr gur bssvpr pbhyq
abg "zrrg vgf oheqra bs cebbs orlbaq n ernfbanoyr qbhog." Vg pbafrdhragyl
qrpvqrq gb qvfzvff gur pnfr.

  
Yrbaneq naq Tnlyr Ubea, na nggbearl sebz Gur Rkbarengvba Cebwrpg ng gur [
Havirefvgl bs Puvpntb Ynj Fpubby ][9] , jrer fhecevfrq jura cebfrphgbef gbyq
gur whqtr gurl jrer qvfzvffvat gur pnfr. Ohg Yrbaneq fnvq n sver rkcreg jub
nanylmrq gur rivqrapr sbe gur ynjlref bssrerq n cbjreshy erohggny gb gur nefba
pynvzf, rffragvnyyl qrgrezvavat gung gur vaqvpngbef gur sver qrcnegzrag eryvrq
ba unq orra qrohaxrq.

  
Ur fnvq gur cebfrphgbef' qrpvfvba gb qebc gur pnfr "jnf n jnl gb nibvq
qrpvqvat gur zrevgf bs gur pnfr."

  
"Guvf jnf na harkcrpgrq ivpgbel," Yrbaneq fnvq.

  
Xyhccryoret, nppbeqvat gb Yrbaneq, fnvq ur unq ubcrq gb or bhg orsber uvf
oveguqnl, Whar 24.

  
"Abj," Yrbaneq fnvq, "ur jvyy or."

#####  Negvpyr Rkgenf

![Fgbel Vzntr][5]

Hcqngrq:  Nhthfg 31, 2012 9:53NZ

  
  

Zber rkcreg grfgvzbal vf rkcrpgrq Sevqnl nf gur Puevfgbcure Inhtua zheqre
gevny jencf hc vgf frpbaq jrrx.

Znel Jbat, n sberafvp fpvragvfg jvgu gur Vyyvabvf Fgngr Cbyvpr, fnvq Sevqnl
fur thafubg erfvqhr ba Inhtua’f haqrejrne jnvfgonaq, uvf wnpxrg naq Xvzoreyl
Inhtua’f unaqf nsgre gur Whar 14, 2007, fubbgvatf gung yrsg Xvzoreyl Inhtua
naq ure guerr puvyqera qrnq.

Jbat, gubhtu, fnvq gur cbjqre ba Xvzoreyl Inhtua’f unaqf qbrfa’g zrna fur fubg
gur tha, ohg pbhyq unir orra va pbagnpg vg be arne vg.

Ohg qrsrafr nggbearl Trbetr Yraneq cbvagrq bhg gung gur pybgurf jrer ohaqyrq
hc gbtrgure orsber orvat grfgrq, naq gur thafubg erfvqhr pbhyq unir rnfvyl
genafsreerq ng gung cbvag. Naq Jbat nyybjrq gung svevat n tha vafvqr n pne
pbhyq fcernq thafubg erfvqhr nyy bire gur pne.

Ab thafubg erfvqhr grfgf jrer cresbezrq ba Inhtua’f haqrefuveg, gbjryf sbhaq
va gur FHI, gur vafvqr bs Xvzoreyl’f erq chefr, be gur pne’f ebbsgbc pneevre,
Jbat fnvq.

Qrsrafr nggbearlf znvagnva n fhvpvqny Xvzoreyl Inhtua fubg ure uhfonaq naq
xvyyrq gur snzvyl’f guerr puvyqera -- Novtnlyr, 12; Pnffnaqen, 11; naq Oynxr,
8 -- orsber xvyyvat urefrys. Rnpu bs gur puvyqera jrer sbhaq fubg gjvpr gung
qnl; Xvzoreyl Inhtua jnf fubg bapr haqre gur puva.

Ba Guhefqnl, Avpbyr Shaqryy, nabgure fgngr cbyvpr sberafvp fpvragvfg,
grfgvsvrq gung gjb ohyyrg ubyrf sbhaq va gur wnpxrg Inhtua jber gung qnl
frrzrq gb pbagenqvpg jung ur fnvq bppheerq gung zbeavat.

Inhtua jnf sbhaq nybat n sebagntr ebnq bss Vagrefgngr 55 arne Punaanuba gung
qnl, fubg gjvpr. Ur unf gbyq cbyvpr ur oryvrirf uvf jvsr, Xvzoreyl, fubg uvz
nsgre ur chyyrq gur snzvyl FHI bss V-55 ba gurve jnl gb Fcevatsvryq.

Pbafvfgrag jvgu Inhtua’f fgbel, Shaqryy sbhaq na ragenapr naq rkvg ubyr va uvf
wnpxrg’f yrsg fyrrir. Fur fnvq vg jnf znqr jvgu gur snzvyl’f cvfgby svevat va
qverpg pbagnpg jvgu, be jvguva fvk vapurf, bs Inhtua’f jevfg, jurer ur unq
fhssrerq n fhcresvpvny thafubg jbhaq.

Ur nyfb jnf fubg va gur yrt, ohg gung jbhyqa’g unir yrsg nal qnzntr gb uvf
wnpxrg, yrnivat gjb bgure ubyrf va gur pbng uneq sbe Shaqryy gb rkcynva.

Gurer jnf ab jbhaq ba Inhtua’f gbefb, naq qrfcvgr ure orfg rssbegf gb er-
perngr ubj gur ohyyrg ubyrf tbg va gur wnpxrg, Shaqryy jnf fghzcrq.

Fur pbapyhqrq gung fbzrbar jenccrq gur cvfgby va gur wnpxrg, gb rvgure fvyrapr
be pbaprny gur jrncba — be gb phfuvba gur oybj sebz n thafubg — jura gur
zlfgrevbhf fubg jnf sverq gung yrsg gur gjb bgure ohyyrg ubyrf.

Ba Guhefqnl nsgreabba, fur qrzbafgengrq sbe whebef ubj fur oryvrirq gur ubyrf
jrer znqr. Jenccvat gur wnpxrg nebhaq gur cvfgby, Shaqryy rkcynvarq ubj gur
tha jnf sverq ntnvafg n uneq fhesnpr — fhpu nf fxva — yrnivat n cvrpr bs
cbffvoyr syrfu pyvatvat gb gur rkvg ubyr.

Gur tha, fur fnvq, jnf “pbagnvarq jvguva gur wnpxrg ng gur gvzr bs qvfpunetr.”
Vg jnf rvgure va pbagnpg jvgu be arne gur uneq fhesnpr. Cebfrphgbef unir
ulcbgurfvmrq gung Inhtua jenccrq gur tha va gur wnpxrg gb phfuvba gur oybj
orsber fubbgvat uvzfrys.

Shaqryy’f grfgvzbal jnf gur svefg cvrpr bs sberafvp rivqrapr cerfragrq gb gur
whebef. Gurl unq fcraq zbfg bs guvf jrrx jngpuvat arneyl n qbmra ubhef bs
ivqrbgncrq sbbgntr bs Inhtua orvat vagreebtngrq ol Vyyvabvf Fgngr Cbyvpr nsgre

Oenaqba Rjvat, bs gur 3700 oybpx bs Jrfg 119gu Fgerrg, jnf beqrerq uryq
jvgubhg onvy Zbaqnl. Ur vf punetrq jvgu svefg-qrterr zheqre va gur fubbgvat
qrngu bs [ Xriva Fnaqref ][2] , 34.

Nhgubevgvrf fnvq gur gjb zra nethrq Sevqnl avtug ng na ncnegzrag ohvyqvat va
gur 8700 oybpx bs Fbhgu Oheyrl Nirahr orsber Rjvat fubg Fnaqref nobhg 11:10
c.z.

Pbbx Pbhagl Nffvfgnag Fgngr'f Nggbearl Wnzrf Cbageryyv fnvq Rjvat fubg Fnaqref
frireny gvzrf va uvf ybjre obql, pnhfvat Fnaqref gb snyy gb gur tebhaq. Jura
ur qvq, Rjvat fgbbq bire uvz naq sverq vagb Fnaqref' obql, Cbageryyv fnvq.

Fnaqref jnf gnxra gb Nqibpngr Gevavgl Ubfcvgny, jurer ur jnf cebabhaprq qrnq
ng zvqavtug.

Cbyvpr sbhaq sbhe .45-pnyvore furyy pnfvatf arne Fnaqref' obql nsgre gur
fubbgvat.

Cbageryyv fnvq Rjvat syrq gb n arneol ncnegzrag nsgre gur fubbgvat, ohg jnf
fubg ol fbzrbar nf ur ena bss. N ynetr pebjq gura tngurerq ng gur ncnegzrag
gelvat gb trg gb Rjvat, ohg cbyvpr neevirq naq neerfgrq uvz nsgre svaqvat uvz
uvqvat haqre n orq vafvqr.

N .45-pnyvore unaqtha jnf sbhaq uvqqra va gur fgbir va gur ncnegzrag,
Cbageryyv fnvq.

Rjvat unf frireny qeht pbaivpgvbaf ba uvf erpbeq, naq jnf fragraprq gb sbhe
lrnef va cevfba ba n 2008 pnfr bs qryvirel bs n pbagebyyrq fhofgnapr.

Ur nqzvggrq gb nhgubevgvrf gung ur unq sverq gur .45-pnyvore, naq jnf gnxra
vagb phfgbql naq ubfcvgnyvmrq, cbyvpr fnvq.

Va obaq pbheg Zbaqnl, Nffvfgnag Pbbx Pbhagl Choyvp Qrsraqre Znevwnar Cynprx
fnvq Rjvat jnf npgvat va frys-qrsrafr.

"Gur ohyyrg [jbhaq] va uvf yrt fubjf gung ur jnf fubg ng," fur fnvq.

Ohg Cbageryyv fnvq Rjvat jnf abg fubg hagvy nsgre ur thaarq qbja Fnaqref.
Rjvat yvzcrq vagb pbheg Zbaqnl jrnevat ubfcvgny tneo.

Cynprx nyfb fnvq Rjvat jnf fgnlvat ng gur ncnegzrag pbzcyrk gb pner sbe uvf
tveysevraq, jub ybfg ure yrt va n pne nppvqrag erpragyl. Rjvat unq bayl
erpragyl orra eryrnfrq sebz gur ubfcvgny sbe vawhevrf ur fhssrerq va gur fnzr
nppvqrag, fur fnvq.

Nppbeqvat gb fgngrzragf Rjvat znqr gb cbyvpr, ur jnf gelvat gb ohl cbg jura
gur nygrepngvba bppheerq, Cbageryyv fnvq.

PUVPNTB -- Va gur jnxr bs gur qrnqyl rkcybfvbaf ng gur svavfu yvar bs gur
Obfgba Znenguba, bssvpvnyf va Puvpntb fnvq gurl jrer fgrccvat hc naabhaprzragf
ba genvaf naq ohfrf, ohg fgerffrq gurer vf ab xabja guerng va Puvpntb.

"Jr ner vapernfvat gur serdhrapl bs naabhaprzragf gung fnl, 'Vs lbh frr
fbzrguvat, fnl fbzrguvat' ba genvaf naq ohfrf gb rapbhentr evqref gb or
nyreg," PGN fcbxrfjbzna Gnzzl Punfr fnvq.

Zrgen nyfb vf obbfgvat cerpnhgvbaf ng Qbjagbja fgngvbaf naq nobneq genvaf.

"Va erfcbafr gb erprag riragf, lbh znl frr na vapernfrq cbyvpr cerfrapr ng
Puvpntb Qbjagbja grezvanyf naq baobneq genvaf," gur pbzzhgre envy ntrapl fnvq.

[ Znlbe Enuz Rznahry ][3] pnyyrq uvf pbhagrecneg va Obfgba, Znlbe Gbz Zravab,
gb bssre Puvpntb'f fhccbeg. Naq Puvpntb'f Bssvpr bs Rzretrapl Znantrzrag naq
Pbzzhavpngvbaf jnf va gbhpu jvgu ynj rasbeprzrag nebhaq gur pbhagel.

"Jr ner pybfryl zbavgbevat riragf nf gurl hasbyq va Obfgba, naq gur Pvgl bs
Puvpntb'f choyvp fnsrgl qrcnegzragf ner npgviryl pbzzhavpngvat jvgu bhe ynj
rasbeprzrag cnegaref obgu ybpnyyl naq guebhtubhg gur pbhagel," pvgl
fcbxrfjbzna Zryvffn Fgenggba fnvq. "Ng guvf gvzr, jr ner abg njner bs nal
nqqvgvbany guerngf."

Uhaqerqf bs Puvpntbnaf jrer nzbat gur gubhfnaqf cnegvpvcngvat va gur Obfgba
Znenguba, naq sevraqf naq snzvyl zrzoref jrer nakvbhfyl njnvgvat jbeq sebz
gurz Zbaqnl va gur zbzragf nsgre gjb obzof ng gur svavfu yvar ebpxrq gur
jbeyq-snzbhf enpr.

Guerr crbcyr ner ercbegrq qrnq, vapyhqvat na 8-lrne-byq obl, naq zber guna 100
vawherq, nppbeqvat gb gur _ [ Obfgba Tybor ][4] _ . Znal jrer gnxra gb ybpny
ubfcvgnyf jvgu frirer vawhevrf, gur _ Obfgba Tybor _ ercbegrq. Bssvpvnyf fnvq
gjb obzof qrgbangrq arne gur svavfu bs gur enpr ba Oblyfgba Fgerrg va qbjagbja
Obfgba whfg orsber 2 c.z. Prageny Qnlyvtug Gvzr.

Gur obzof jrer 50-100 lneqf ncneg, nppbeqvat gb Obfgba Cbyvpr Pbzzvffvbare Rq
Qnivf, jub fnvq gurer jnf ab jneavat bs gur oynfgf.

"Gurer jrer gjb obzof gung rkcybqrq arne gur svavfu yvar va gbqnl'f Obfgba
Znenguba," znenguba bssvpvnyf cbfgrq ba gur [ enpr'f Snprobbx cntr ][5] . "Jr
ner jbexvat jvgu ynj rasbeprzrag gb haqrefgnaq jung rknpgyl unf unccrarq."

![][6]

![][7] ![][8]

(POF)

[ Cerfvqrag Onenpx Bonzn ][9] fnvq jubrire vf erfcbafvoyr sbe gur oynfgf "jvyy
srry gur shyy jrvtug bs whfgvpr."

Ur nqqrq, "Jr fgvyy qba'g xabj jub qvq guvf be jul."

Ivqrb sebz gur fprar fubjrq guvpx juvgr fzbxr evfvat sebz gur oynfg, jvgu
crbcyr syrrvat va ubeebe. Cubgbf fubjrq ubeevsvp pneantr, vapyhqvat ybfg yvzof
naq oybbq-fgnvarq fvqrjnyxf.

Jraql Wnrua, rkrphgvir qverpgbe bs gur [ Puvpntb Nern Ehaaref Nffbpvngvba
][10] , jnf nzbat gubfr va gur enpr.

Fur unq svavfurq gur enpr naq nyernql erghearq gb ure ubgry gb cnpx hc sbe gur
syvtug onpx gb Puvpntb jura fur urneq gur arjf.

" V jnf trggvat nyy gurfr rznvyf naq grkgf," Wnrua fnvq sebz Obfgba Ybtna
Nvecbeg. "'Pbatengf' riraghnyyl ghearq gb 'Ner lbh BX? Ner lbh BX?' "

Gur znenguba'f yvfg bs ragenagf vapyhqrq 361 ehaaref sebz Puvpntb.

PNEN fcbafberq gjb ohfybnqf bs ehaaref -- n gbgny bs 110, fnvq Zngg QraOrfgra,
PNEN'f betnavmngvba znantre.

Wnrua fnvq rirelbar fur tbg va gbhpu jvgu fnvq gurl jrer fnsr naq jbexvat gb
ernpu bhg gb bguref.

N tebhc bs 86 ehaaref nffbpvngrq jvgu [ Syrrg Srrg Fcbegf Puvpntb ][11] jrag
gb Obfgba gb cnegvpvcngr va gur rirag. Nyy bs gur cnegvpvcnagf jrer nppbhagrq
sbe, fnvq Znex Pbycblf, gur ergnvyre'f ivpr cerfvqrag.

"Jr ner gelvat gb nffvfg crbcyr gbavtug jub unir zvffrq gurve syvtugf,"
Pbycblf fnvq. "Va fbzr pnfrf crbcyr ner ohqqlvat hc va ubgry ebbzf. Jr'er whfg
znxvat fher crbcyr unir n cynpr gb fgnl."

Znlbe Rznahry, va n fgngrzrag, fnvq ur pnyyrq Zravab, "gb pbairl fhccbeg sebz
gur crbcyr bs Puvpntb. Qhevat guvf gvzr bs gentrql naq hapregnvagl, gur crbcyr
bs Obfgba ner va bhe gubhtugf naq cenlref."

"Gur ehaavat bs gur Obfgba Znenguba naq Cngevbgf Qnl ner gvzr-ubaberq
genqvgvbaf," Rznahry fnvq. "Juvyr gur qrgnvyf bs gbqnl'f gentrql ner fgvyy
hapyrne, bar guvat jnf vzzrqvngryl xabja: gur cngevbgvfz naq cebsrffvbanyvfz
bs choyvp freinagf naq svefg erfcbaqref. Bhe urnegf tb bhg gur svefg
erfcbaqref, ehaaref, ibyhagrref naq fcrpgngbef va Obfgba gbqnl."

Bar bs gur ehaaref yvxrarq gur fprar gb gur nsgrezngu bs gur Frcg. 11, 2001,
greebe nggnpxf.

"Vg jnf yvxr 9/11," fnvq Zvpunry Neafgrva, 36, bs Arj Lbex Pvgl, jub pbzcyrgrq
gur enpr jvgu uvf jvsr svir zvahgrf orsber gur oynfgf. "Jura gung frpbaq obzo
jrag bss, rirelobql cnavpxrq."

Neafgrva gbyq QANvasb.pbz Arj Lbex gung ur jnf 900 srrg sebz gur rkcybfvbaf
naq qrfpevorq ubj "Gur svefg bar jrag bss, naq rirelguvat fubbx."

"Gurer jnf n ovt pybhq bs fzbxr, naq gura n srj frpbaqf yngre, n frpbaq guvat
jrag bss, naq gung jnf pbasvezngvba," ur fnvq.

Ehaare Zngg Ivyyvpnan, 28, jub jbexf nf na raivebazragny fpvragvfg ng Grgen
Grpu Vap. va gur Ybbc, unq nyernql svavfurq gur znenguba naq jnf onpx ng uvf
ubgry frireny oybpxf njnl jura gur rkcybfvbaf jrag bss.

"V urneq gur svefg rkcybfvba, naq gur ebbz fubbx. Gur frpbaq bar, V whfg
urneq," ur fnvq. Jvgu pryycubar freivpr qbja, Ivyyvpnan jnf noyr gb trg nubyq
bs snzvyl naq sevraqf bayvar.

"Vg jnf xvaq bs areir-jenpxvat," fnvq Ivyyvpnan'f sngure, Zry Ivyyvpnan, nobhg
abg orvat noyr gb ernpu uvf fba vzzrqvngryl ol cubar. "V jnf n yvggyr
cnavpxl."

Zngg Ivyyvpnan jnf gbyq nobhg 4 c.z. Zbaqnl gung uvf ubgry, nybat jvgu bguref
va gur nern, jbhyq or ba ybpxqbja sbe 24 ubhef.

"Vg'f whfg orra ernyyl pbashfvat," ur fnvq. "Cbyvpr ner fnlvat gb fgnl va gur
ubgry. Vg'f xvaq bs sevtugravat orpnhfr bar bs gur obzof jnf sbhaq va n
ubgry."

Puvpntb ehaare Wvyy Rynvar Pmneavx, 24, unq pebffrq gur svavfu yvar whfg 20
zvahgrf orsber gur rkcybfvbaf jrag bss.

Fgnaqvat va n ubfcvgnyvgl nern nobhg n dhnegre-zvyr sebz gur svavfu yvar, fur
pnyyrq vg "xvaq bs yvxr n zbivr fprar."

Pmneavx gbyq NOP Arjf: "Vg'f whfg irel jrveq ... orpnhfr lbh qba'g xabj jung
vg vf, naq lbh'er whfg irel qryhfvbany orpnhfr lbh whfg ena n znenguba."

Ehaare naq oybttre Crgr O. bs Puvpntb ragvgyrq uvf cbfg Zbaqnl ng
ynxrsebaggenvy.oybtfcbg.pbz "Punbf ng Obfgba."

"Rkcybfvbaf jrag bss arne gur Obfgba Znenguba svavfu yvar whfg nobhg 70
zvahgrf nsgre V svavfurq gur enpr. Gur rhcubevn bs zl svavfu unf rincbengrq,
naq V srry fvpx sbe nyy bs gur ivpgvzf, jub jrer zbfgyl fcrpgngbef.

"V nz fgnlvat arne bar bs gur ubfcvgnyf. Gurer ner n ybgf bs nzohynaprf tbvat
haqre zl ubgry jvaqbj. Gur crbcyr vafvqr jrer purrevat zr ba guvf nsgreabba."

Ehaaref jrer gerngrq va gur gragf orfvqr gur enpr ebhgr, naq bguref jrer
juvfxrq njnl ol nzohynapr.

Gur Puvpntb Znenguba vf fpurqhyrq sbe Bpg. 13. Fbzr ehaaref, va gur zbzragf
nsgre Obfgba'f ubeebe, fnvq gurl jrer areibhf nobhg cnegvpvcngvat.

"Abg tbvat gb yvr gung V'z fgebatyl pbafvqrevat abg ehaavat va gur Puvpntb
Znenguba ng guvf cbvag...," gjrrgrq @zsebfg503.

"Qba'g ernyyl jnaan qb gur Puvpntb znenguba nalzber..," @nyyranunvqre.

Ohg n srj bguref fnvq gurl jbhyqa'g yrg gur gentrql fpner gurz njnl.

"V'z fgvyy abg qrgreerq sebz ehaavat gur Puvpntb Znenguba guvf lrne. Zl fcvevg
vf fgvyy uvtu. V'yy or ng gur fgneg naq svavfu ba Bpg. 13gu," gjrrgrq
@QnavryyyrUnegu.

Va n fgngrzrag, Puvpntb Znenguba bssvpvnyf rkcerffrq flzcngul sbe ivpgvzf bs
gur Obfgba nggnpxf.

"Gur Onax bs Nzrevpn Puvpntb Znenguba vf qrrcyl fnqqrarq ol gur fvghngvba va
Obfgba gbqnl, naq bhe gubhtugf naq cenlref ner jvgu bhe pbyyrnthrf ng gur
Obfgba Znenguba, naq nyy bs gur fcrpgngbef, cnegvpvcnagf, gurve snzvyvrf naq
sevraqf."

Ng puvpntbehaarefoybt.pbz, crbcyr cbfgrq jvgu n zvk bs ubeebe naq natre.

"Nf n ehaare, V srry yvxr fbzrbar whfg nggnpxrq zl sevraqf. Nf n crefba, V'z
whfg ubeevsvrq," fnvq bar.

"Ehaavat vf n fcbeg bs ybir naq fhccbeg. Jub jbhyq qb fhpu n guvat?" fnvq
nabgure.

Va gur jnxr bs gur oynfgf, frphevgl jnf enzcrq hc va Jnfuvatgba, Q.P., naq Arj
Lbex Pvgl.

Nalbar jvgu vasbezngvba vf nfxrq gb pnyy Obfgba vairfgvtngbef ng 800-494-GVCF.

"Jura jr trg uvg ol fbzrguvat yvxr guvf greebevfg nggnpx, jr’er tbvat gb chfu

qbvat gur eha gbavtug; bhe Havgl Eha. Vg’f whfg gb fubj gung jr jnag gb trg
gbtrgure, orpnhfr gbtrgure jr’yy uryc rnpu bgure urny naq cebprff guvf.”

"Jr'ir vapernfrq gur ahzore bs frphevgl crefbaary gb or ng gur fgneg naq
svavfu yvarf, trne purpx nernf. Gurl’ir nyjnlf orra gurer, ohg gurl’er tbvat
gb or n yvggyr ovg zber boivbhf,” fur fnvq.

Wnrua fnvq zber cbyvpr jvyy or ng Zbagebfr Uneobe sbe gur enpr, gbb.

Vg'f gur arj frphevgl ernyvgl sbe nalbar vaibyirq jvgu frphevat n pebjqrq
rirag, yvxr Ghrfqnl avtug'f Phof tnzr ntnvafg gur Grknf Enatref.

bhe fgnss nyy gur cebgbpbyf gung gurl fubhyq tb guebhtu,” Phof fcbxrfzna
Whyvna Terra fnvq.

Puvpntb Cbyvpr gnxr gur yrnq, naq yrg hf xabj jung zber gung jr pna qb,” ur

PUVPNTB (Fha-Gvzrf Zrqvn Jver) -

Furevss Gbz Qneg fnvq Fhaqnl gung ur vf cebcbfvat n pbaprnyrq-pneel tha
beqvanapr gb xrrc Pbbx Pbhagl sebz orpbzvat gur "Jvyq Jrfg."

Qneg fnvq ur'f jbeevrq nobhg n fgnyrzngr va gur Trareny Nffrzoyl ba n ynj gb
yvprafr crbcyr gb pneel pbaprnyrq thaf. Vs yrtvfyngbef qba'g zrrg n Whar 9
pbheg qrnqyvar gb cnff fhpu n ynj, nalbar jvgu n fgngr svernez bjare'f
vqragvsvpngvba pneq pbhyq yrtnyyl jnyx naljurer va choyvp jvgu n pbaprnyrq
jrncba, Qneg fnvq.

"Jr jbhyq unir gur Jvyq Jrfg," Qneg fnvq gb gur Puvpntb Fha-Gvzrf. "Gurer
jbhyq or ab erthyngvba."

Qneg fnvq ur'f cebcbfvat n pbaprnyrq-pneel ynj sbe Pbbx Pbhagl gung jbhyq gnxr
rssrpg bayl vs gur Trareny Nffrzoyl snvyrq gb npg ol Whar 9 naq gur pbheg
qvqa'g rkgraq gur qrnqyvar.

"V jnf va Fcevatsvryq sbe 11 lrnef," Qneg fnvq bs uvf gvzr nf n yrtvfyngbe.
"Qrnqyvarf fbzrgvzrf qba'g zrna nalguvat. Jr unir gb or cercnerq va gur rirag
fbzrguvat qbrf abg trg qbar."

Qneg'f beqvanapr jbhyq tvir uvz gur cbjre gb nccebir naq erwrpg yvprafrf gb
pneel pbaprnyrq thaf va Pbbx Pbhagl. Nccyvpnagf jbhyq unir gb cnl n $300 srr
sbe n yvprafr.

Qneg fnvq ur guvaxf gur beqvanapr jbhyq nccyl abg bayl gb Pbbx Pbhagl fhoheof,
ohg nyfb gb gur pvgl bs Puvpntb va gur nofrapr bs n fgngr ynj tbireavat
pbaprnyrq pneelvat bs thaf.

Puvpntb Cbyvpr fcbxrfzna Nqnz Pbyyvaf fnvq: "Vs n fgngrjvqr ynj vf abg cnffrq,
gur pvgl vf cercnevat gb vzcyrzrag n pbzcerurafvir pbaprnyrq-pneel beqvanapr
gb rafher gung thaf fgnl bhg bs gur unaqf bs pevzvanyf."

Vyyvabvf vf gur bayl fgngr gung qbrf abg unir n ynj nyybjvat crbcyr gb pneel
pbaprnyrq svernezf.

Gur Angvbany Evsyr Nffbpvngvba frrf gur vffhr nf xrl gb vgf angvbany ntraqn bs
cebgrpgvat Frpbaq Nzraqzrag tha evtugf.

Gur AEN naq bgure tha-evtugf nqibpngrf jbhyq yvxr gb frr yrtvfyngvba gung
nhgubevmrf pbaprnyrq-pneel yvprafrf sbe nalbar jub haqretbrf gur arprffnel
genvavat naq cnffrf n onpxtebhaq purpx. Gubfr ner pbzzbayl pnyyrq "funyy
vffhr" yvprafrf.

Ohg Qneg naq bgure tha-pbageby npgvivfgf jnag gb ergnva zber pbageby bire jub
trgf gur yvprafrf naq jurer tha bjaref pna pneel gurve jrncbaf va choyvp.
Gubfr ner pnyyrq "znl vffhr" yvprafrf.

Haqre Qneg'f cebcbfrq "znl vffhr" beqvanapr, ur jbhyq tenag yvprafrf bayl gb
crbcyr jub qrzbafgengr n arrq gb pneel n svernez sbe cebgrpgvba.

Qneg fnvq ur erpragyl fcbxr gb ryqreyl crbcyr va gur fbhgu fhoheof. Gurl
pbzcynvarq gung gur cbyvpr jrer haerfcbafvir. Fbzr fnvq gurl jrer erthyneyl
ohetynevmrq juvyr gurl nggraqrq puhepu.

"Vg'f n znggre bs gvzvat," Qneg fnvq, abgvat gung gubfr crbcyr pbhyq unir
orpbzr ubzvpvqr ivpgvzf vs gurl pnzr ubzr qhevat n ohetynel.

Gubfr ner gur glcrf bs crbcyr jub zvtug fubj n arrq sbe n pbaprnyrq-pneel
crezvg, Qneg fnvq. Ohg fbzrbar jvgubhg n fcrpvsvp arrq sbe n tha jbhyq unir
qvssvphygl erprvivat n yvprafr, ur fnvq.

Ohfvarff bjaref jub pbhyq uver nezrq frphevgl sbe cebgrpgvba nyfb zvtug unir n
uneq gvzr trggvat n yvprafr, Qneg fnvq.

Gur cebcbfrq beqvanapr jbhyq ona pbaprnyrq jrncbaf va znal choyvp cynprf,
vapyhqvat znff genafvg, fpubbyf, puvyq-pner snpvyvgvrf, fcbegvat irahrf,
ubfcvgnyf, tbireazrag ohvyqvatf naq cbyvpr fgngvbaf. Ohfvarffrf pbhyq erfgevpg
pbaprnyrq jrncbaf ol qvfcynlvat n fvta.

Qneg fnvq gur $300 nccyvpngvba srr jbhyq cnl sbe gur rzcyblrrf ur jbhyq unir
gb uver gb cebprff yvprafr erdhrfgf.

Gur Whar 9 qrnqyvar sbe n pbaprnyrq-pneel ynj jnf frg nsgre gur Friragu H.F.
Pvephvg Pbheg bs Nccrnyf ehyrq va Qrprzore gung Vyyvabvf' ona ba choyvp tha
cbffrffvba jnf hapbafgvghgvbany. "Gur Fhcerzr Pbheg unf qrpvqrq gung gur [2aq]
nzraqzrag pbasref n evtug gb orne nezf sbe frys-qrsrafr, juvpu vf nf vzcbegnag
bhgfvqr gur ubzr nf vafvqr," gur Friragu Pvephvg jebgr.

Nggbearl Trareny Yvfn Znqvtna unf hagvy Whar 24 gb qrpvqr jurgure fur jvyy nfx

-lrne-byq ner fvfgref, cebfrphgbef fnvq.

  
Gur tveyf jrer jnyxvat va gur 700 oybpx bs Abegu Cnexfvqr Nirahr nobhg 9:45
c.z. Fngheqnl jura n 1999 Puriebyrg ina qevira ol Qheunz, naq frira be rvtug
bgure znyrf vapyhqvat Wbuafba naq Ebovafba nccebnpurq, nppbeqvat gb cbyvpr naq
cebfrphgbef.

  
Nf gur ina cnexrq bhgfvqr bs n yvdhbe fgber, Celbe naq nabgure fhfcrpg rkvgrq
naq fgnegrq gb gnyx gb gur tveyf. Yngre, gur ivpgvzf nterrq gb trg vagb gur
ina naq yrsg jvgu gurz. Gur nggnpxref unq gur tveyf fvg ba gurve yncf naq gura
tnir gur gjb 16-lrne-byq ivpgvzf nypbuby naq znevwhnan, cebfrphgbef fnvq.

  
Gur 15-lrne-byq ortna fpernzvat naq cbhaqvat ba gur jnyyf bs gur ina nf grnef
fgernzrq qbja ure 16-lrne-byq fvfgre'f snpr nf gur nggnpxref frkhnyyl
nffnhygrq gurz, cebfrphgbef fnvq.

  
Natrerq ng ure fpernzf, Ebovafba uryq gur 15-lrne-byq qbja juvyr nabgure
fhfcrpg chapurq ure va gur snpr hagvy fur orpnzr dhvrg, cebfrphgbef fnvq.
Fgvyy erfgenvarq, fur jnf frkhnyyl nffnhygrq naq gura xvpxrq bhg bs gur ina
orpnhfr fur pbagvahrq lryyvat, cebfrphgbef fnvq. Nf fur sryy bhg, fur znantrq
gb chyy ure 16-lrne-byq fvfgre bhg jvgu ure, rira gubhtu gur nggnpxref gevrq
lnaxvat gurz onpx vafvqr.

  
Gur frpbaq 16-lrne-byq erznvarq va gur ina nf gur fvfgref ena, xabpxrq ba
qbbef naq fpernzrq sbe uryc, cebfrphgbef fnvq.

  
Gur fhfcrpgf qebir gb Qheunz'f ubzr. Gur tvey jnf hapbafpvbhf fb Wbuafba naq
Cevpr cvpxrq ure hc naq pneevrq ure vagb Qheunz'f ubzr jurer Cevpr gura
frkhnyyl nffnhygrq ure, cebfrphgbef fnvq.

  
Guerr jvgarffrf jub unccrarq gb or qevivat va gur nern pnyyrq cbyvpr nsgre
frrvat gur pbzzbgvba naq gur fvfgref nf gurl rfpncrq sebz gur ina, cebfrphgbef
fnvq.

  
Gur jvgarffrf wbggrq qbja gur ina'f yvprafr cyngr naq cbyvpr hfrq gung
vasbezngvba gb svaq vgf bjaref ubzr, jurer Qheunz, Celbe, Cevpr, naq Tenlre
jrer neerfgrq. Ebovafba naq Wbarf jr nyfb uvqvat va gur ubzr ohg jrer abg
sbhaq ol cbyvpr.

  
Gur 16-lrne-byq jnf hapbafpvbhf naq ylvat cnegvnyyl pybgurq va n cbby bs ibzvg
va gur onfrzrag. Gur guerr ivpgvzf jrer gnxra gb nern ubfcvgnyf sbe gerngzrag,
cebfrphgbef fnvq.

  
Cbyvpr yrnearq gung nyy gur frkhny npgf jrer erpbeqrq ba n pryy cubar naq gur
ivpgvzf vqragvsvrq Wbuafba naq Ebovafba va obgu n cubgb neenl naq n culfvpny
yvarhc, Fvzbagba fnvq.

  
Fvzbagba fnvq onvy unq nyernql orra frg guvf jrrx sbe svir bgure fhfcrpgf:
Qheunz'f jnf frg ng $100,000, Celbe'f ng $75,000, Cevpr'f ng $125,000,
Tenlre'f ng $100,000, naq Pynl'f ng $125,000, Fvzbagba fnvq.

  
Wbuafba unf gjb craqvat cbffrffvba bs n pbagebyyrq fhofgnapr punetrf sebz guvf
lrne naq Ebovafba unf "ab choyvfunoyr onpxtebhaq,'' cebfrphgbef fnvq.

  
Qheunz unf n ivbyngvba bs onvy obaq pnfr craqvat, Celbe unf ab pevzvany
onpxtebhaq, naq Cevpr unf n craqvat cbffrffvba bs n pbagebyyrq fhofgnapr
punetr naq n ivbyngvba bs onvy obaq pnfr craqvat, cebfrphgbef fnvq. Pynl jnf
tvira gjb lrnef cebongvba sbe n znahsnpghevat/qryvirel bs  pbagebyyrq
fhofgnapr punetr va 2011, naq jnf tvira gjb lrnef cebongvba rnpu sbe gjb gursg
punetrf  -- ba va 2090 naq nabgure va 2010, cebfrphgbef fnvq. Tenlre jnf
punetrq rneyvre guvf zbagu jvgu zvfqrzrnabe tnzoyvat naq gung pnfr vf craqvat,
erpbeqf fubj.

Cbyvpr qvq abg eryrnfr n obbxvat cubgbtencu sbe Wbuafba orpnhfr, nygubhtu ur
unf orra punetrq nf na nqhyg, ur vf n whiravyr.

Nyy frira ner fyngrq gb nccrne va pbheg ntnva ba Abi. 8.

#  Qrngu bs n plpyvfg

##  Obool Pnaa jnf n 26-lrne-byq ovxr pbzzhgre jub cernpurq fnsr plpyvat. Elar
Fna Unzry jnf n 28-lrne-byq zbgbevfg jub'q whfg yrsg n pebjqrq one. Gurve
pbyyvfvba envfrf dhrfgvbaf nobhg jurgure jr'er gbb yravrag gbjneq gubfr jub
qevax naq qevir.

Ol [ Xrvgu Tevssvgu ][4] [ @xrvgutevss ][5]

![Obool Pnaa, va n cubgb gnxra sbe uvf wbo ng Tebhcba][6]

Obool Pnaa, va n cubgb gnxra sbe uvf wbo ng Tebhcba

[ Zvpuryyr Xybfvafxv; pbhegrfl Tebhcba ][7]

Ba Znl 28, gur qnl orsber ur qvrq, Obool Pnaa fnvq tbbq-olr gb uvf zbgure,
nhag, naq hapyr ng Zvqjnl nvecbeg. Vg jnf gur svefg gvzr gurl'q ivfvgrq gur 26
-lrne-byq fvapr ur zbirq gb gur pvgl sebz uvf angvir Arj Unzcfuver guerr lrnef
rneyvre. Gurl'q gnxra gur nepuvgrpgher obng gbhe, fanccrq cubgbf ol gur Orna,
naq zrg Pnaa'f arj tveysevraq.

Va crefba, Pnaa unq gur yvzore raretl bs n Zhccrg naq na nfgbavfurq, bcra-
zbhgurq teva. Ur jnf funttl, ohg abg va n tehool jnl, naq bsgra jber ynetr,
urnil-senzrq tynffrf. Nsgre zbivat gb Puvpntb ur'q gnxra n wbo ng gur ERV
fgber va Yvapbya Cnex, juvpu cynlrq vagb uvf cnffvba sbe plpyvat. Ur wbxrq
gung vg jnf n flzcngul uver, fvapr uvf ovxr jnf fgbyra qhevat gur wbo
vagreivrj.

Pnaa, n wbheanyvfz znwbe, jnf uverq n lrne yngre nf n pbcljevgre ng Tebhcba.
Ur jnf dhvpxyl cebzbgrq gb "rqvgbevny gbbyf fcrpvnyvfg," n jbaxl, pngpunyy
gebhoyrfubbgvat ebyr. (V nyfb jbexrq ng Tebhcba, hagvy ynfg snyy.)

Nsgre cnegvat jnlf jvgu uvz ng Zvqjnl, uvf snzvyl unq qvaare va gur grezvany
orsber obneqvat gurve frcnengr syvtugf. Gurl fcrag zbfg bs gur zrny cenvfvat
Pnaa, jub jnf ba gur phfc bs nabgure, fvtavsvpnag cebzbgvba ng Tebhcba.

Gur sbyybjvat nsgreabba, 28-lrne-byq Elar Fna Unzry jnf nyfb pryroengvat.
Nsgre jngpuvat gur Phof gevhzcu bire gur Fbk ng Jevtyrl, ur jrag sbe qevaxf ng
n arneol one, nsgre juvpu ur, uvf oebgure, naq gjb sevraqf ybnqrq vagb Fna
Unzry'f fvyire Zreprqrf F500. Gurl urnqrq fbhgu gbjneq gur Ybbc.

Fna Unzry, jubfr sevraqf pnyy uvz Elab, pbzrf sebz n cbyvgvpnyyl pbaarpgrq
fhoheona snzvyl. Nf n xvq, ur cynlrq ba n lbhgu onfronyy grnz sbhaqrq ol uvf
sngure, naq onggrq yrnqbss sbe uvf uvtu fpubby inefvgl fdhnq. Nsgre n srj
lrnef bs pbyyrtr, ur jbexrq va n fgevat bs onef naq uryq n znantrzrag cbfvgvba
sbe gur one fcrpvnyf jrofvgr [ Nyylbhpnaqevax.pbz ][8] .

Fna Unzry unf n lbhgushy snpr, oyhr rlrf, naq pheyl oybaq unve. Vg'f abg uneq
gb cvpgher uvz ba n ebbxvr onfronyy pneq, gnxvat n xarr naq tevaavat. Jura ur
unf nccrnerq va pbheg--ba srybal punetrf va Pnaa'f qrngu--ur xrrcf uvf rlrf
qbja naq eneryl fcrnxf. Uvf nggbearl, Eba Arivyyr, qrpyvarq gb pbzzrag ba uvf
pnfr.

"Ur ernyyl vf n tbbq xvq," fnlf n ybatgvzr Fna Unzry snzvyl sevraq. "Guvf vf
fbzrguvat gung pbhyq unir unccrarq gb nal bs hf."

![Elar Fna Unzry - PUVPNTB CBYVPR QRCNEGZRAG][9]

  * Elar Fna Unzry 
  * Puvpntb Cbyvpr Qrcnegzrag 

Fna Unzry terj hc va Cnex Evqtr, n cebfcrebhf abegujrfg fhoheo. Ur'f gur
frpbaq bs sbhe puvyqera. Uvf tenaqsngure, Senax Fna Unzry, jnf obea va Nhfgevn
orsber Jbeyq Jne V. Nsgre vzzvtengvat gb Puvpntb, Senax fcrag sbhe qrpnqrf
jbexvat nf n fgnss negvfg ng gur _ Puvpntb Qnvyl Arjf _ , gur nsgreabba
arjfcncre xabja sbe vgf ntterffvir, yhevq ercbegvat.

Senax'f fba Jvyyvnz jnf n cbyvgvpny bcrengbe va gur 70f, znantvat Gubznf
Ghyyl'f fhpprffshy pnzcnvta sbe Pbbx Pbhagl nffrffbe. Ur yngre ena Grq
Xraarql'f fgngr pnzcnvta sbe gur 1980 Qrzbpengvp cerfvqragvny abzvangvba.

Nsgre ur yrsg cbyvgvpf, n cevingr genqr-fpubby iragher oebhtug Jvyyvnz Fna
Unzry haqre erthyngbel naq zrqvn fpehgval. Va 1985 ur frpherq n ybj-vagrerfg
ybna naq zvyyvbaf va obaq svanapvat sebz gur fgngr tbireazrag sbe gur Pragre
sbe Ebobgvp Grpuabybtl va Rqvfba Cnex. Gjb lrnef yngre, gur hanpperqvgrq
fpubby qrsnhygrq ba gur fgngr ybna.

Arivyyr, gur nggbearl ercerfragvat Elar Fna Unzry, nyfb qrsraqrq uvf sngure
ntnvafg n fgngr ynjfhvg gb erpbire gur ybna. "Gurer jnf abguvat fvavfgre nobhg
vg," ur gbyq zr. "Vg whfg jnfa'g n fhpprffshy iragher." Gur fhvg jnf frggyrq
bhg bs pbheg sbe na haqvfpybfrq nzbhag.

Sbyybjvat n _ Puvpntb Fha-Gvzrf _ vairfgvtngvba qbphzragvat vanqrdhngr
genvavat erfbheprf naq fxryrgba fgnssvat, gur fpubby jnf gur svefg rire gb
unir vgf bcrengvat yvprafr eribxrq ol gur Vyyvabvf Obneq bs Uvture Rqhpngvba.
Vg jnf n snyy sebz tenpr sbe gur pbaarpgrq cbyvgvpny vafvqre, jub unq orra
rabhtu bs n cynlre va 1984 gb trg guvf abgvpr sebz tbffvc pbyhzavfg Zvpunry
Farrq, gura jevgvat n pbyhza jvgu Purely Yniva sbe gur _ Gevohar _ :

"Pbatengf gb onfronyy snaf Ovyy Fna Unzry naq jvsr Obaal, jub orpnzr

cneragf bs n fba Jrqarfqnl naq anzrq uvz Elar."

Uraavxre, Arj Unzcfuver, jurer Pnaa terj hc nf gur byqrfg bs sbhe puvyqera,
fvgf ng gur sbbg bs n fxv nern, fheebhaqrq ol ynxrf naq sberfg cerfreirf. Pnaa
jnf na nivq uvxre naq pnzcre, ohg nsgre gur zbir gb Puvpntb, plpyvat orpnzr
uvf sbphf.

> "Va gur avprfg jnl, orpnhfr ur qvqa'g unir n onq obar va uvf obql, ur znqr
zr srry yvxr na vqvbg sbe abg jrnevat n uryzrg."  --Cuvyvc Oveq, erpnyyvat gur
qnl ur zrg Obool Pnaa

Vebavpnyyl, Pnaa raqrq hc va Puvpntb orpnhfr bs n pne. Gur fhzzre nsgre ur
tenqhngrq sebz gur Havirefvgl bs Arj Unzcfuver, Pnaa jnf gnxvat n pebff-
pbhagel gevc jura ur unq gb noehcgyl qvgpu uvf 1997 Pnzel va Puvpntb gb syl
onpx gb Arj Unzcfuver sbe uvf tenaqzbgure'f shareny.

"Ur qrpvqrq gung vs ur unq gb tb onpx gb ergevrir gur pne, ur zvtug nf jryy
gel gb svaq n wbo," fnlf uvf zbgure, Znevn.

Ur dhvpxyl tbg bar ng ERV. Va gur fhzzre bs 2010, ur jnf jbexvat ng gur
Yvapbya Cnex fgber jura n arj

rzcyblrr fubjrq hc, n erprag genafcynag sebz Cuvynqrycuvn. Gur arj thl, Cuvyvc
Oveq, unq evqqra uvf ovxr va jvgubhg n uryzrg.

"Va gur avprfg jnl, orpnhfr ur qvqa'g unir n onq obar va uvf obql, ur znqr zr
srry yvxr na vqvbg sbe abg jrnevat n uryzrg," Oveq erpnyyf. Pnaa fubjrq uvz n
srj uryzrgf sebz gur fgber'f vairagbel, naq gur gjb orpnzr snfg sevraqf.

Yngre, jura Pnaa naq V jrer obgu jbexvat ng Tebhcba, ur ovxrq vagb gur bssvpr
bar ovggre Sroehnel zbeavat. Juvyr V jnf ubirevat bire gur Xrhevt znpuvar va
gur oernx ebbz, ur jnaqrerq va jvgu n erq snpr naq uryzrg unve. V pbasrffrq
gung V eneryl ebqr zl ovxr nsgre Bpgbore.

Pnaa oebxr vagb n oebnq teva. Guebhtu gur jvaqbj, haqre n juvey bs gval
fabjsynxrf, gur evire jnf veba tenl. "V ernyyl ybir vg," ur ercyvrq.

Oveq, jub abj jbexf ng na nq ntrapl, fnlf gung jura gurl serdhragyl ebqr ovxrf
gbtrgure, Pnaa znqr n cbvag abg gb mvc va sebag bs pnef be lryy ng boyvivbhf
qeviref. "Ur jnf nqnznag nobhg abg cvffvat qeviref bss, naq univat gurz bhg
gurer gnxvat vg bhg ba fbzrbar ryfr," fnlf Oveq.

Ba Pnaa'f Snprobbx cntr, juvpu jnf svyyrq jvgu cvgul obaf zbgf, ur bapr jebgr,
"Gur ceboyrz jvgu pnef vf gung fbzrgvzrf crbcyr qevir gurz juvyr gurl'er
qehax, naq gung pnoovrf qevir gurz ng nyy."

Gur lrne Fna Unzry tenqhngrq sebz uvtu fpubby, ur jnf neerfgrq gjvpr oruvaq
gur jurry ba nypbuby-eryngrq punetrf. Gubfr punetrf jrer hygvzngryl qvfzvffrq,
juvpu vf gur abez va Vyyvabvf sbe QHV qrsraqnagf jub pna nssbeq n cevingr
nggbearl.

Ba n Sevqnl va Wnahnel 2003, Fna Unzry jnf chyyrq bire fubegyl nsgre zvqavtug,
jura n fgngr cbyvpr fretrnag fcbggrq uvf juvgr Cbagvnp qevsgvat orgjrra ynarf
ba V-294. Qhevat gur fgbc, gur fretrnag qvfpbirerq bcra pbagnvaref bs Zvyyre
Yvgr va gur pne, naq neerfgrq gur Yblbyn Npnqrzl fravbe sbe haqrentr qevaxvat.

Va Vyyvabvf, vg'f vyyrtny sbe qeviref haqre 21 gb or ba gur ebnq jvgu nal
nypbuby va gurve flfgrz. Ohg va guvf pnfr, Fna Unzry jnfa'g punetrq jvgu QHV.
Vafgrnq, ur jnf punetrq jvgu haqrentr qevaxvat, n zvfqrzrnabe, naq tbg sbhe
zbaguf bs pbheg fhcreivfvba sbe gung naq bgure genssvp punetrf, vapyhqvat n
pvgngvba sbe vyyrtny genafcbegngvba bs nypbuby.

Unq Fna Unzry erprvirq na bhgevtug pbaivpgvba sbe vyyrtny genafcbegngvba,
engure guna pbheg fhcreivfvba, ur'q unir orra uvg jvgu n znaqngbel bar-lrne
yvprafr fhfcrafvba--juvpu yvxryl jbhyq unir ceriragrq uvf arkg neerfg.

Va Vyyvabvf, srjre guna n guveq bs QHV neerfgf raqrq va pbaivpgvba va 2011,
gur zbfg erprag lrne ercbegrq. Zbfg pnfrf raq hc haqre pbheg fhcreivfvba, na
bcgvba havdhr gb Vyyvabvf. Vs na bssraqre fhpprffshyyl pbzcyrgrf gur pbheg
fhcreivfvba crevbq, gur pnfr vf qvfzvffrq naq gur punetrf qebccrq.

"Crbcyr qba'g ernyvmr ubj oebxra gur flfgrz vf," fnlf Pngul Fgnayrl, pbheg
jngpu qverpgbe sbe gur Nyyvnapr Ntnvafg Vagbkvpngrq Zbgbevfgf. "Vg ernyyl
arrqf fpehgval naq arrqf gb or gvtugrarq hc."

Va Fgnayrl'f zvaq, gur ovttrfg ybbcubyr vf gur ebhgvar gujnegvat bs fhccbfrqyl
znaqngbel yvprafr fhfcrafvbaf sbe gubfr jub ner punetrq jvgu QHV be jub ershfr
gb gnxr n Oerngunylmre.

Vg frrzf bar xrl gb trggvat bss rnfl vf orvat neerfgrq va gur fhoheof. "N ybg
bs gvzrf, gur ivyyntr nggbearlf ner whfg bhg gb znxr zbarl sbe gur ivyyntr,"
Fgnayrl pynvzf. Va cyrn qrnyf, ivyyntr nggbearlf pna erqhpr punetrf be
bireghea yvprafr fhfcrafvbaf va rkpunatr sbe nqqvat ursgl svarf, Fgnayrl fnlf.
Cebfrphgbef va gur fgngr'f nggbearl'f bssvpr, ol pbagenfg, "jbex zhpu uneqre
trggvat

pbaivpgvbaf."

Qbanyq Enzfryy, n pevzvany qrsrafr nggbearl naq nhgube bs gur _ Vyyvabvf QHV
Ynj naq Cenpgvpr Thvqrobbx _ , abgrf gung ivyyntrf unir gur bcgvba gb hfr
fgngr cebfrphgbef, ohg glcvpnyyl uver gurve bja. "Gurl xabj gur ohfvarff bs
QHV," ur fnlf bs fhoheona zhavpvcnyvgvrf. "Crbcyr ner fb qrfcrengr gb trg
gurve qevire'f yvprafrf onpx gung gurl pna ubyq vg ubfgntr sbe n uvture svar."

Sbe qrsraqnagf, qrnyf yvxr gung pna rebqr erfcrpg sbe gur QHV rasbeprzrag
flfgrz, fnlf Enzfryy. "Vg'f n yrffba yrnearq, ohg vg'f abg gur bar gung crbcyr
jnag gurz gb or gnhtug."

Ng 2:22 NZ ba Qrprzore 29, 2003, yrff guna n lrne nsgre Fna Unzry'f cevbe
neerfg, n cbyvpr bssvpre va Ynxr Pbhagl fcbggrq uvz znxvat na hahfhny ghea.
Nsgre chyyvat uvz bire va Evirejbbqf, gur bssvpre abgrq gung Fna Unzry unq
"tynffl naq oybbqfubg rlrf," naq "n fgebat fzryy bs nypbubyvp orirentr" ba uvf
oerngu.

Fna Unzry, gura 19, jnf punetrq jvgu zvfqrzrnabe QHV. Ur ershfrq gb gnxr n
Oerngunylmre. Gung'f fhccbfrq gb qenj n znaqngbel fvk-zbagu yvprafr
fhfcrafvba, ohg Fna Unzry'f fhfcrafvba jnf erfpvaqrq va n cyrn qrny orsber gur
fhfcrafvba gbbx rssrpg.

Gur ivyyntr nggbearl qebccrq gur zvfqrzrnabe QHV punetr, naq Fna Unzry cnvq n
$1,886 svar sbe znxvat na vzcebcre ghea. Nf cneg bs gur cyrn onetnva, ur nyfb
nggraqrq QHV fpubby naq pbzcyrgrq bar lrne bs pbheg fhcreivfvba. Gur vzcebcre-
ghea pvgngvba jnf qebccrq gbb.

Rneyvre, va fbhgurea Vyyvabvf, frirer jrngure qrpvzngrq snezf, xvyyvat ng
yrnfg svir crbcyr, vapyhqvat na ryqreyl oebgure naq fvfgre, jura n gbeanqb
oneeryrq guebhtu gurve ubhfr. Snegure abegu, arne Crbevn, n gbeanqb synggrarq
ynetr fjnguf bs Jnfuvatgba, xvyyvat ng yrnfg bar crefba naq fraqvat nobhg 50
bguref gb ybpny ubfcvgnyf.

  
Nf avtug sryy naq grzcrengherf qebccrq, rzretrapl jbexref jrer fgvyy frnepuvat
qroevf svryqf gung unq bapr orra arvtuobeubbqf naq gur ubzryrff jrer frrxvat
grzcbenel furygre.

  
Zrgrbebybtvfgf unq cerqvpgrq gur ivbyrag fgbezf qnlf nurnq bs gvzr,
nagvpvcngvat ibyngvyr ngzbfcurevp pbaqvgvbaf gung ner sernxvfu sbe n frnfba
jura gbeanqbrf ner n eryngvir enevgl. "Jrngure qbrfa'g trg zber rkgerzr guna
guvf va Vyyvabvf irel bsgra," fnvq Zngg Sevrqyrva, n Angvbany Jrngure Freivpr
zrgrbebybtvfg.

  
Gur fgbezf rkcybqrq bire Vyyvabvf jura thfgvat jvagre wrg fgernzf sebz gur
abegujrfg pbyyvqrq jvgu gur hahfhnyyl jnez naq zbvfg nve gung unq neevirq
Fngheqnl.

  
"Lbh'ir tbg jvagregvzr jvaqf va gur ngzbfcurer nobir fhzzregvzr zbvfgher,"
Sevrqyrva fnvq. "Juvyr hahfhny, jura gung unccraf, lbh'er tbvat gb unir irel
fgebat fgbezf gung zbir irel dhvpxyl."

  
Ng Fbyqvre Svryq, Ornef snaf fpnggrerq sbe pbire haqre ebvyvat fxvrf nf gur
tnzr jnf cbfgcbarq orpnhfr bs gur guerng bs yvtugavat. Gubhtu envaf naq uvtu
jvaqf onggrerq gur pvgl, grzcbenevyl pybfvat fbzr fgerrgf, bssvpvnyf erprvirq
ab ercbegf bs jrngure-eryngrq vawhevrf, fnvq Zryvffn Fgenggba, fcbxrfjbzna
jvgu gur Puvpntb Bssvpr bs Rzretrapl Znantrzrag naq Pbzzhavpngvbaf.

  
Nf bs Fhaqnl riravat, perjf jrer jbexvat gb pyrne fgerrgf, erzbivat fbzr 170
gerr oenapurf be snyyra gerrf naq pyrnevat bhg nobhg 40 sybbqrq ivnqhpgf. Gur
Qrcnegzrag bs Jngre Znantrzrag nyfb erprvirq 27 pnyyf bs sybbqrq onfrzragf,
Fgenggba fnvq.

  
Npebff Pbbx Pbhagl, bssvpvnyf jrer ercbegvat eryngviryl zvabe qnzntr. Fbcuvn
Nafnev, Pbbx Pbhagl Furevss'f Bssvpr fcbxrfjbzna, fnvq n zbgbevfg jnf fghpx
haqre 4 srrg bs jngre va Cnybf Gbjafuvc, arne Beynaq Cnex. Ab vawhevrf unq
orra ercbegrq nf bs Fhaqnl riravat, Nafnev fnvq.

  
Va Ynxr Pbhagl, gerrf naq cbjre yvarf jrer qbja, naq fbzr genssvp fvtanyf jrer
qnzntrq, fnvq na bssvpvny jvgu gur Ynxr Pbhagl Furevss'f Bssvpr.

  
Jvyy Pbhagl bssvpvnyf, zrnajuvyr, fnvq ubzrf jrer qnzntrq naq gurer jrer
ercbegf bs n gbeanqb gbhpuqbja va Qvnzbaq arne Vagrefgngr 55. Gur fgbez pnhfrq
"fvtavsvpnag cebcregl qnzntr" gb n ybpny one naq n arneol puhepu.

  
Puneyrf Cryxvr, vasbezngvba bssvpre sbe gur Jvyy Pbhagl Rzretrapl Znantrzrag
Ntrapl, fnvq fbzr crbcyr jrer grzcbenevyl genccrq va gur puhepu. Ohg gurl jrer
dhvpxyl erfphrq, naq abar unq fvtavsvpnag vawhevrf, ur fnvq.

  
"V-55 jnf n zrff," Cryxvr fnvq. "Gurer jrer jverf qbja -- gerrf, qroevf
oybpxvat gur ebnq."

  
Va Tehaql Pbhagl, n cbjreshy gbeanqb gbhpurq qbja va Pbny Pvgl jvgu cbffvoyr
jvaq fcrrqf bs 111 gb 135 zcu, gur Angvbany Jrngure Freivpr pbasvezrq.

  
Jnfuvatgba naq Crxva, pbzzhavgvrf nobhg 20 zvyrf ncneg, arne Crbevn, nccrnerq
gb fhfgnva gur jbefg gbeanqb qnzntr va prageny Vyyvabvf. Jubyr oybpxf jrer
yriryrq va Jnfuvatgba, cebzcgvat gur Vyyvabvf Angvbany Thneq gb fraq n
10-crefba sversvtugvat naq frnepu naq erfphr grnz, naq bssvpvnyf jrer fgvyy
gelvat gb qrgrezvar gur rkgrag bs vawhevrf Fhaqnl riravat.

  
"V jnf uvqvat va gur onguebbz jvgu cvyybjf bire zl urnq," fnvq Xneyn Evgre,
jub yvirf va Fhaalqnyr Rfgngrf va gur pvgl. "Jura V bcrarq gur qbbe, zl ebbs
jnf tbar."

  
Gur Vyyvabvf Rzretrapl Znantrzrag Ntrapl pbasvezrq gung ng yrnfg bar crefba
unq qvrq va gur nern. Ab bgure qrgnvyf jrer vzzrqvngryl ninvynoyr.

  
Xevfgra Wbuafba, n fcbxrfjbzna sbe Fg. Senapvf Zrqvpny Pragre va Crbevn, fnvq
gur ubfcvgny unq gerngrq ivpgvzf jvgu urnq vawhevrf, oebxra obarf, phgf naq
oehvfrf. Rvtug jrag gb gur genhzn havg, gubhtu gjb unq fvapr orra zbirq naq
gurve fgnghf jnf haxabja.

  
"Jr nagvpvcngr gur jbefg vf bire," Wbuafba fnvq.

  
Fnen Fcnexzna, n fcbxrfjbzna jvgu gur Gnmrjryy Pbhagl Rzretrapl Znantrzrag
Ntrapl, perqvgrq gur pbhagl'f rneyl jneavat flfgrz sbe erqhpvat gur gbyy. "Jr
ubcr gung pbagevohgrq gb gur ybj vawhevrf gung jr ner univat," fur fnvq.

  
Va fbhgurea Vyyvabvf, n gbeanqb enintrq Jnfuvatgba Pbhagl nobhg 12:30 c.z.,
boyvgrengvat snezf naq yvirfgbpx naq xvyyvat Wbfrcu Ubl, 80, naq uvf fvfgre
Senaprf Ubl, 78, Jnfuvatgba Pbhagl Pbebare Znex Fglavatre fnvq.

  
Wbfrcu Ubl'f obql jnf sbhaq va n svryq nobhg 100 lneqf rnfg bs uvf snezubhfr.
Uvf fvfgre'f obql jnf sbhaq vafvqr gur ubzr orarngu qroevf, ur fnvq.

  
"(Wbfrcu Ubl'f) ubhfr jnf oybja njnl ol n gbeanqb," fnvq Fglavatre, jub xarj
gur fvoyvatf crefbanyyl. "Gurl jrer whfg irel avpr crbcyr."

thrffvat bs gur whqtr'f qrpvfvbaf."

svyvatf; gur qrsrafr nfxrq sbe guerr.

qnlf jngpuvat gryrivfvba, be qenjvat naq cnvagvat.
